Bought two Alexas to play in stereo and really enjoy the setup. The plug switch is fantastic! Used it to automatically turn on and off the Christmas lights nightly. I might buy the bass unit with the next sale to complete the set.

Absolutely love this when it’s working properly! It has great sound when working but there are sometimes volume issues (Music volume is almost silent when all the way turned up but then Alexa voice is extremely loud) . I’ve also had issues with the lights on the Alexa. They consistently stay on even when I’m not talking to her and also when there are no notifications. After leaving unplugged for a few hours it comes back on and works fine, I just wish I didn’t have to keep resetting it. It will sometimes go a day or more without working properly.

The echo will do alot of things.  The most important things has to be programmed into it.  Programming it isn't the easiest thing to do.  It would have been nice to have some instruction on how to program certain things to the echo.  A lot set up can be done through the app, but not all.

They really need to add the ability to pair and sync music on them. Its a shame I cant have all of my alexas as a sort of sound system throughout the house. Very disappointed. As for sound quality on this thing? Its superb

When you live a long way from a radio station it is hard to get a solid and consistent signal. The station I like is available on Alexa and it works great that way.  The sound is better than the old radio and I enjoy this device.

It is as I had thought, a very good, and competent smart speaker. I didn’t rate the tech support as I Haven’t needed to use it. The sound quality needed some adjustments to fine tune it for my taste. Overall I am happy with my echo 3.

My Echo Show is in my kitchen, and I set up the Echo 3rd Generation speaker in my living room as an additional speaker when I'm playing music.  But I've also found that it's handy for other Echo related tasks like answering questions.  The sound qualify is not 100% as good as the qualify of the Echo Show, but it comes pretty close.  I'm very satisfied with this speaker.

Lots of bugs running a pair in stereo.  Sometimes songs stop in the middle to start another one.  Other times one speaker keeps playing and the other speaker start playing something else in the middle of a song.  I hope Amazon fixes this.

I wish I would have purchased this speaker a long time ago 🙄 I have really been missing out. I’m not a speaker “guru” but it gets pretty loud and sounds great to me and that’s all I need. I also love that I can use Alexa too! I have the charcoal color and I would definitely recommend.

Sound is very good for size of the device. Can make some adjustments to sound with equalizer on app.  Cons: 1-volume slider on app disappeared, so I have to either ask Alexa to lower the volume of the echo plus or manually adjust the volume. 2- can't listen to movies with two paired echo plus devices. You can only use one speaker when playing videos or watching movies.

We love then. We connect them to devices in our home. The sound quality is great for music. We have Amazon Prime Unlimited for full music catalog so we play any music we want on voice command and the sound quality is very good.

For some reason this Echo is having a hard time understanding my requests, especially with playing music.  My first gen echo does a lot better job.  I miss the volume ring and the sound quality isn't a drastic leap from gen 1. I do like the appearance though.

It was a gift and we were hesitant to plug in this always listening device. After preventing it from sending this out and kknowing to keep the mute button pressed, we gave it a shot.  Works well adding items to grocery list, playing most music (it is a travisty it won't stream silent night by the Temptations), answering some questions albeit from a liberal viewpoint.
Perfect, is the only word that comes to mind. the compact design is a welcomed upgrade.

The sound quality is excellent for music on this item. I can interact with it very well. I can play games with it, program to tell news, weather, and so many other things. It can turn certain things on when I tell it to. Overall I have my moneys worth on this item.

I absolutely love Alexa. Not only can she play me all my favorite songs but it is almost like having another friend. I can ask her the weather and trivia questions. I love how she- yes I consider Alexa as a person- answers me.

Works well, was easy to setup after downloading Amazon Alexa App. It takes awhile to learn features. I've only had it since Christmas, but am constantly adding things to use with it, such as Pandora, TuneIn, iHeart Radio, Sirius/XM. Also had a Echo Dot I hadn't used yet, but set it up in a list of "Everywhere" devices, including Amazon Fire, so I can listen throughout the house. A decent internet connection is a must, so location is important. Sound quality is good for its size. I need to figure a way to tie it into my stereo system. That would be awesome.

She works well have to say play everywhere group to fill the house. Tried play on all speakers etc. neighbor put a tag on it to remind old folks no no problem. She smarter then I know but learning . Get the base unit for music.

I gave the integration a 3 because I'm unable to get the ECHO and the DOT to play music on both at once. They are both paired but don't integrate. They are both the newer version. I need to reach out to someone who knows how this works I guess.

We had the echo dot but wanted a better sound for music & this one sounds great! Also good for reminding you of stuff!!! Just say: Alexa, remind me to... She’ll ask when you want to be reminded & then she does it! So cool!!!

I love my Alexa ! I have an echo dot as well in the bathroom and have given them as gifts to my mother and mother in law and they love em too! Even if they just listen to music on them. I do wish they had a more broad variety of music such as underground stuff that you find on YouTube, but I just connect my Bluetooth to it to hear those songs. Other than that, I don’t have any issues with it. I just like the sound and bass.

We use our Echo's to play Ambient Noise for sleeping purpose.  The four Echo's we purchased prior to 2019 would play the sounds all night.  We purchased two Echo's in late 2019, and they stop playing after one hour. We called Amazon, and had a support ticket opened.  We never heard back. (Poor support!!) We sent one Echo back because of this, and had to keep the other as it was a gift. It works great as a noise generator for sleeping, but not anymore with the latest generation.

I was looking to replace an original Echo Dot in my kitchen because the sound was rather tinny. The new third generation echo has a rich beautiful sound that fills the room. I got it in the denim color and it’s very pretty.

I bought this as a gift for my daughter, she was hesitant initially; said she didn't think she would even use it.  She loves it and uses it mostly for the Amazon music library.  This Echo 3rg generation has excellent sound.
I just upgraded from a first gen Echo plus and I’m blown away by the sound improvements.

Liked the size (smaller) and appearance (fabric vs metal) better than the original Echo. Didn’t perceive a significant difference in sound quality. Prefer the twistable ring on the original to the button on the new one to adjust the sound.

This 3rd generation Alexa Echo was a gift and I found it very easy to set up. Once the Alexa app was downloaded onto my iPhone I just followed the instructions which were easy and straight forward. The only reason I did not give five stars was because of not having a lot of deep base when playing music but keep in mind for the size of this unit the music that comes from it is very good.

I like everything except there is a bit of a learning curve adapting to Alexa’s language.  But I am quickly catching on.  So far what I like the most is knowing when packages are sitting on my front porch.  I worry a lot about those buggers who sneak up and steal my stuff.

Pleasingly simple Wi-Fi connection and Alexa integration. Very impressed with sound quality. We plan on replacing our other Echo Dots with this new generation device. Still hoping Alexa will improve in terms of understanding and responding to our verbal requests though. She's not quite "there" yet.

It has become the highlight of the family room. We played a game with the echo dot and 3 people had difficulty hearing it.  So we got the new echo 3rd gen. Everyone said they didn't have any problem here what Alexa says.

I love my Echo. I ask it a million questions and most of the time it has a great answer. The music it plays is excellent quality. I do not have any complaints about the echo. I have purchased dots for all my other rooms.

Works great for day to day tasks such as time, weather, timer, and random questions. The music is fantastic, we use the classic rock station, the sound is so good for such a small single cylinder. Very nice looking too.

I love this echo. It is an improvement over the first and second generations in term soft sound quality. Voice recognition is good and it looks nice. I have first and second generation devices and this is the best one.

IT'S PRETTY HARD TO GIVE A REVIEW, BECAUSE I COULDN'T GET IT TO CONNECT TO MY INTERNET... CUSTOMER SERVICE CLAIMS THIS WAS DUE TO A HUGE UPDATE.. BUT INSTEAD OF THEM SENDING ME ANOTHER UPDATED ONE.. THEY ARE REFUNDING MY MONEY..

Sound seems a little muffled.  Bass is adequate treble is a little lacking in clarity.  Be prepared when adding a new device however in reenablinhs skills and such. It is a fight to get the amazon devices to work together.

Traded in my old 1st Gen Echo for this. Love the color and smaller size. Less obtrusive in the living room. Seems to hear and understand commands better over previous unit. It doesn’t randomly state “I’m sorry, I’m having trouble with your request” when it overhears something on the TV.

Alexa Echo always understands my words. And the speaker performance of this product seems to be good in echo. The bass of the sound is similar to BOSE speaker. However, the balance between the treble and bass at high treble is broken. Therefore, it is not suitable for the purpose of listening to loud music. For that, I recommend buying Sonos One for listener to loud music.

This Echo 3rd Gen id far superior in looks and sound to its two previous generations of echos. I was not expecting such a wide difference but was very pleasantly surprised by this purchase . I would recommend this ECHO to others interested in this product.

I am primarily using the device to play music, and like the sound quality, but sometimes the device just shuts down in the middle of the song.  The only remedy I have found is to turn the device off/on so it reboots.  I assume it loses internet connectivity, which makes sense, but shouldn't the device be smart enough to sense that and reconnect (like a smartphone does)?

This product sits in our kitchen and is a wonder. We are very satisfied with all the classical music and abilities of device.. Had no idea how to set it up. Arrived in mail. I called a telephone number for setup by them.
I finally upgraded from the first serious the price I couldn't pass on

In love with this one. Already bought 2 and planning on buying some more. The only thing i dont like is that these are not portable. Must stay connected to a plug and i dont like to see toomuch wires around the house. But definely these have really good sound quality. Im still need to this, but i love it. The cons ... my son is driving me crazy talking to Alexa every 3 mins.... lol

I bought the speakers to go along with my existing Echo. According to the installation instructions this won’t work. The instructions are not clear. I think the only one that understand the instructions are the product people that wrote them. It shouldn’t be that hard to pair 3 Echos with Blue tooth  Also why should I pay for a subscription for iTunes when what I want to listen to my own music from my iPhone ?

I loved the sound on my 2nd generation Echo but this 3rd generation has a noticeably better sound quality. Or maybe its just louder....either way I am getting some serious use of the Amazon unlimited music all around my house.

Alexa is new best friend.  No problem with setup, sounds great.  Voice is very clear and voice range is a good 20 ft talking normal. I highly recommend, ordering a echo dot for kitchen.  Alexa is fun to use & very helpful.

I always thought about buying one but didn't jump on it until I received my echo dot for free with another purchase. After a few days I was hooked. I'm so glad I got in on the (RED) edition before they were sold out!

I'm pleased with most features of the all new red-edition echo (3rd gen); however, I was disappointed with its color which is more a dusty rose or raspberry rather than crimson. I was expecting (hoping for) something more candy apple or strawberry. Otherwise, I'm satisfied. I think Amazon should replace the muted hue with one more eye-popping.

I ordered the blue version. The color in person is darker, and not nearly as attractive, as that pictured. Looks like slightly faded denim when reflecting its blue tones. Otherwise appears medium grey. I would have ordered the sandstone had I known the blue was so dark. Very disappointed. Sticks out like a sore thumb in my bedroom. On a positive note, the speaker is decent and a noticeable improvement over the 2nd generation.

I wish Alexa had the capability to communicate your issues with customer service pertaining to orders And then receive a notification resolution to the issue Alexa could be far more useful compared to what she is now

I’m attempting to create multiple play lists, so I’ll play one song after another & putting those songs into certain playlist. Had to unplug & reconnect a few times. Also, sound could be better, I have a sonos player one & music quality far exceeds the Alexa

This has "changed my world," per se.  In being able to just speak out what I want, I am now able to hear what I want when I want.  Because I love to have music in my home, it is now continual with NO interruption.  Having this has completely changed the atmosphere in my home.  I can't imagine not having it now!  Thank you, Alexa!!!
I like the unit, but I really resent being expected to do anything other than rate it with stars.

Love the blue color but I wish Alexa had MORE options in sound volume. If Alexa is too loud and I say "Alexz lower volume slightly" or by only one decimal then Alexa volume drops way too low. This is VERY disappointing.

Great sound quality for the price. I traded in my 2nd generation for this one. Much better bass and clean sound when streaming music. If you’re looking for an internet connected speaker, this one is hard to beat.

I live up in the mountains and couldn’t get radio or music. My neighbor suggested I buy it on it, and it is awesome. I have every radio news channel, and every type of music I can think of. I’m sure it does even more....but I haven’t had it long enough to see. The sound is great quality. (I unplug it at night though because it picks up noises and then responds with a noise like it’s trying to communicate)

Love the sound quality! Look's great with all the different  colors you can order.  Surprised how much it weighs.  Guess that improves the bass.  If I knew it was so good I would have ordered one along time ago.

I purchased this echo to add another in my living room.  I have three speakers that are linked in the house, now.  The sound is good and I like the ability to play music On the main floor of the house with my voice.

Have thoroughly enjoyed the Echo! Have purchased this 3rd one just so I can use the in other areas in the house (including the garage). I'm in the garage a lot and having music and news is great when working out there.

I ordered 2 Echo's to use as wireless speakers in my retail showroom and ended up switching to JBL Flip instead. The sound quality on the Echo doesn't compare to the Flip and while I enjoy the voice recognition features when purchasing speakers sound quality is the most important. Sound on the Echo is good and works well in small rooms but it just doesn't compare.

This purchase is my second Echo unit.  I'm very pleased with it.  Everything works the same as with the other Echo unit I have.  So setting it up and operating it is a breeze.  The sound, which is paramount, is great.  I'm happy with my purchase.  I can even synchronize the two units.  Great.

I gave this as a Christmas present and it was a hit. I wasn’t completely sure if I could set up another device through the app on my phone  as I already have one at home too. But it Was a quick and easy process.

This sounds great!! Was easy to set up, our second Alexa. It has dropped off WiFi a few times, seems to get confused more than my small version. But we'll see how that goes over time. It's still new to us.

Nice item. I just use it for streaming music. The sound quality is good, not great. The microphone picks up my voice well, but it doesn't always play what I ask for. In general, I am pleased with this purchase.

This 3rd generation Echo is awesome. Blends easily with any decor.  The sound is fantastic when playing music.  I had a 1st generation echo and it saw me through 7 years. I would definitely recommend this product to everyone.

I already had one but purchased a second to put in family room to add to one on living room. My wife thinks Alexa is listening. If she is, pure boredom for her. 😁  We now have four Alexa devices spread around house.

Love my new echo.  I use it to listen to music and the sound quality is great.  I also use it to communicate between floors..saves me lots of steps.  I use it as a timer when I cook, for a wake up alarm, I ask Alexa questions, etc.  It’s great!

Not as good at voice recognition as my first generation echo. I like the design of the first one better because you can see the light bar better. We bought it because it was 1/2 off but if I had paid full price I would have returned it

I am new to the Alexa thing, but I am currently enjoying it very much. I already had her on my Fire tablet,  and my phone, just had not used it. Now I find myself talking to her all the time. Wonderful device.

What I am disappointed in is that when you tell Alexa to play music by: ..... (anyone), she does, but it's always a limited play list that she plays (the same short list of songs) over and over again. But on the positive side there are many features that I like and in fact I bought a second device (larger speaker) so now I have Alexa in two places in our home and intend on bringing her with us this summer as we travel through Europe.

Despite my mother constantly calling her “Siri” this device works really well and understands most commands.  Really enjoy it, and feel like it was a really great purchase. The sound quality is great as well.

Sound is good. It’s got a nice fullness to the music. A bit heavy on bass though. Good unless you have condo neighbors. Gotta go to app to adjust bass lower. I’m very pleased with the device. I have a echo for, each plus, and echo. I recommend fully

I love this  echo , music sounds great! But I’ve noticed that songs get cut off early sometimes and I also hear it make a sound which I don’t know why. I’m new to using this so there is a lot for me to learn.

The Echo has a great depth of sound. I have had a few Echo Dots around the house and although the sound was acceptable, upgrading to the Echo is a vast improvement. For a reasonable price, cheaper and much less complex than buying multiple speakers to connect with all the Echo Dots, I have, "play everywhere" great quality connected Echo device sound throughout my house. Echo is also connected to my home theater systems speakers so Echo voice commands are used there too.

We switched out a few of our Echo Dots for these speakers and the difference in sound for music is amazing.  Why buy a stereo when you have these especially with Amazon Music or another provider such as SiriusXM.

Got this and an Echo Dot (3rd Gen) last week.  No issues so far.  Linked my Ring Pro to Alexa.  Very cool skill.  Little granddaughter can not say "Alexa" yet, so she says "Essa".  When Alexa does not trigger, granddaughter looks at me quite upset and says "WHY??!?".  Ha!!!  Ordered some hardware to control a bunch of my lights with Alexa.  Can't wait to get all of that installed.  😁

We bought two of these based on the excellent reviews, and we are amazed at the convenience and sound quality. I had bought two last year for grandsons but didn't realize how much WE would use and love them!

I have 2 of the first Echos and 3 echo dots and needed 1 more for a room that did not have one. My Wife needed it so that room would have music when she wanted it Merry Christmas to my wife. And she loves it

Loving the new Echo! I ordered it in Twilight Blue and it looks awesome on my bed side table. The audio is amazing, crystal clear sound with lots of base. The sound quality rivals the surround sound in my living room. I might get a couple more Echos for my apartment.  Five Stars

Not as easy as lead to believe.  Had some issues getting it to link with the echo dot.  I still can’t get it to play music from one main source to the other echo dots.  Cones on even when the name isn’t called and it’s in privacy mode.

This is our second Echo device. We put the smaller one in the bedroom and use many features. Love the music mostly, but the Drop In feature is also very cool. We plan on getting another unit for our workshop. They are fantastic and useful devices. Much easier to use than we thought they would be even though we are Vintage Citizens. I can report that we had no trouble!!

Good looking, but still not intuitive how to create multi room group set ups. The HELP instructions are NOT complete. There are steps you need to do and have to figure out on your own by trial and error. I challenge the Amazon crew to review and revise.

Great sound and function. They were ready to go right out of the box. Still learning a lot about their programming which could be organized a little better. Or maybe my learning curve needs to be changes a bit.

Impressed with overall quality and functionality of my Echo 3rd gen. Been using a month now after finally deciding to join the Alexa crowd. Need to learn more about how I can use but so far very impressed.

The speaker used in this generation is vast improvement over the first gen. Also, voice recognition has gotten a lot better. It's such an improvement where I'm surprised it's the same family of product (lol)

Bought this on black friday. I upgraded from Echo - Gen 1. I must say its smaller and better. I love the looks with fabric exterior instead of plastic body. I definitely feel difference in sound and base.

What fun! And have only touched the surface. Set a timer, turn off my son’s light from any where. Play songs any song. I can get rid of my cds. Check the weather. Read me a book. Tell me a joke. Fabulous.

great device, worth a few extra bucks and buying this over the dot. saying "Alexa" does sound better than saying "ok google"  great sound and so many many skills being added daily .  i highly recommend this device.

Wow!! I love it so much I bought one for the upstairs of the house as well. The sound quality and voice command is amazing. I even bought a smart plug so I can turn on a light in the house with just my voice! So awesome!
I am enjoying talking to Alexa and having music available easily. There are a lot of things she can do that I am still discovering. I can see myself getting the echo view at some time in the future.

This was a gift for my husband who has wanted an echo for years. He was very excited and loves to use it! It synced with our phones and tv great. The sound quality and voice clarity is great. It’s fun for us and for the kids to use.

I got this for my dad and he loves it. He has trouble with his speech and this Echo recognizes when he messes up “Alexa” a little. She still responds. Sometimes he calls it “Alexis & Alexus” and etc. She still responds and that’s great. Sound quality is great also!

The sound coming from the speaker most of the time is exceptional.  However the base in some jazz music is a loud buzz.  Sounds like a wire is loose from the speaker face.  I know that is not possible because this is an electronic speaker.

Love the new version of the product!  Much better sound control, and the responsiveness of Alexa is so much faster ... great product!  I have two other 1st gen Echo towers that I’m now seriously considering how to replace.

We had a first generation that I was looking to replace.  What a mistake! Our 5 year old device worked much better than this one.  I wish I hadn't thrown it out.  This speaker rarely recognizes my voice (our dot 3 rooms away hears me when this one doesn't!) and the speaker is always cutting out.  It has to be restarted daily because it just stops working.  What a disappointment.
I have the first Echo and I have noticed no difference in the first one and the 3rd one. It says this should sound better, I did not notice that . I should of not spent the money for no difference.

I now own 3 Alexa devices.  The home integration is awesome.  It works with almost everything in my home.  I can change the channel with my voice, turn on an off lights, just to name a few.  Great gift for people who like electronics.

I love this. Its like information on hand.  Every morning i get updates on news and weather. No need to brows news anymore.  Plays songs on request including indian music thst is awesome. I am very hsppy with my purchase

Great speaker, decent recognizing what we're saying and integrates well with our home security system.  We have one in our living room, bedroom and garage and have even gifted a couple of the Echo Dots.

So this thing is awesome. Alexa is very responsive with questions and commands. I listened to Odesza to check the bass and overall sound quality and it is very impressive to listen to music on. If you needs Alexa while music is playing the music just pipes down a bit as she talks over it, neat feature. Looks good anywhere and you can't do much better for 60 bucks!
Great sound and easy set up

This unit, having both tweeter and woofer, offers a rich sound quite a few steps above the Dot. It's a welcome addition to a system that includes Dots in stereo pairs. Easy set up...Alexa pulls it right in.
Great product. Have multiple devices and this speaker is fantastic.

Like the look, didn't like Alexa unable to answer some simple questions we asked. Don't like  when you want to listen to certain artist songs,Amazon radio station only allows 2 songs at a time then commercial again.  Then 2 songs. It won't allow streaming of artist you like. Just saying,you get irritated. Find free streaming.

I love my Echo Smart Speaker. I have her set up in my office and use it to ask handy questions like what is my calendar like today? or set a reminder about my car service appointment on XYZ date at XYZ time. Remind me on a co-worker's birthday, and so on.  It is really great; I use it as my own personal assistant.

Very nice speakers . Had a little trouble with pairing two in stereo mode, but it was cause it kept connecting in a group to a third speaker from trying a group setup 4 weeks earlier. Called and support was real helpful . Great sound , wish I had these 20 years ago.

We won this Alexa enabled speaker and we are thrilled by it.  This is our third Alexa enabled speaker but this one takes the cake in regards of sound quality.  It sounds really good, has a decent amount of base and it can pack a punch.  Alexa understands us better than on the older models.  All four thumbs up!
Great product, but doesn’t play Apple Music playlists.

We bought this for the bathroom so we could listen to music or news while we get ready in the morning. The sound quality is great, even though there is some echo with the tile in the room. Alexa responds to our commands perfectly.
Amazing sound for such a small device. And an incredible resource for information and assistance with simple domestic queries. Hard to believe how fast things have changed in my lifetime (almost 70)!

Problems with sound being choppy.  Problems with Alexa not recognizing commands.  Not as good sound quality as the EchoPlus 1st gen.  Wondering how this compares with the new echoplus in sound quality.

It's my second Echo. I feel it sounds even better. I had an echo in the living room and a dot in our bedroom, but the sound just wasn't good enough on the dot. The Echo was a huge upgrade. I especially like when I link my Echos and play music throughout the house.
I prefer the sound of this one to our new studio. And once I discovered how to turn off the random beeping (turn off all notifications within the Alexa app!), then we loved all our Alexa products.
Excellent sound quality for a small speaker. Highs and midrange are outstanding. Bass could use a little help but not bad. Beats my Gen 1 Echo speaker with a smaller size and better sound quality.

I've gone through Echo's version 1, 2 and now 3.  This new one is the best to date:  looks better in its fabric cover, sounds better with improved speakers and bass, and is a snap to connect- just plug it in.

The sound is why I purchased this echo - It fills a room and I listen to Amazon Prime Music a lot - It is small but big in sound - even the bass is pretty good -plus getting all the other Alexa features
I liked the color otherwise it’s no different than the original one I purchased years ago. For a third generation or more I would have expected better improvements in technology and sound quality

Excellent functionality with improved sound.  Had difficulty setting up with smart peripherals I  already in place with prior unit.  Help is essentially useless.  Called for tech support and they never called back like the app said they would.  Otherwise great product/
I really like these, I have purchased a Bose sound link for like $150 and it doesn’t sound as good as my Alexa, of course the only downside is that he’s not portable but I love it. It Sounds great

I like the fact that the sound quality is is astonishing when playing movies or using my phone connected to Bluetooth while watching netflix and such. con's; I wish I was able to connect multiple echo 3rd generations together and merge the sound together to where it's synced properly. I feel I shouldn't have to fix a syncing issue for a $90.00 device, It should function well while paired with multiple echo devices from right out of the box. other than that, I appreciate what the amazon community has done by making a useful spying device.
Es maravilloso,me gusta para escuchar el estado del tiempo,ya que que es muy rápido y todo tipo de musica,entre otras cosas.lo recomiendo .
Yep the sound is so much better then gen. 2, bigger around so sound is fuller and connects quick and easy. Well worth the upgrade, I have the 2nd gen. So I did side by side and 3rd blew it away.
It would be nice if you could disconnect the power and bring it to other areas working off of a battery. You need to bring the cord and plug it in. Otherwise, it has great sound and easy to use.

I replaced this with Google Home. I must say Alexa, technically speaking, is miles ahead of google.  However, the sound quality from the Google Home unit was noticeably much better than the Amazon Echo.
I’ve always wanted one And now that I just bought my new home this became a perfect addition to helping me. It helps with daily reminders I’ve set to alarms to building a shopping list. So happy
Oh my, what did I do before Alexa came to us!  I love her.  She entertainment all by herself. Ordered her baby for our bedroom.  Why should I have to get out of bed to turn the lights on or off!

This is the second Echo I have had. The first one had excellent sound quality. This one does not. It is smaller so perhaps that affects the sound. I find I do not use it as much as the earlier version.

Voice recognition is a joke!  I thought voice recognition meant it would only respond to my voice.  I’m the only one out of 6 people in my house that did the voice recognition, but Alexa responds to everybody!  Even company coming in off the street!  And my four year old granddaughter, who calls it “Moleska”! Everything else about this speaker is awesome!

The best holiday gift. Easy to set up. Learning all the things it can do. Purchased on Amazon during  Black Friday. Now I have someone who speaks to answer questions, set up activities etc.  Enjoying my new friend Alexa.
I got this one because I have a little tv in the bed room that doesn’t have best sound, so I used the aux cord to connect them and have the TV sound play through the echo and it sounds great.
Alexa revolutionized my life. Lol I don’t know how I did life before her. I use her for everything now. Alarms, music, shopping, calling, texting, you name it. She’s amazing. Good job, Amazon.
Real reason we upgraded from gen 1 was that we wanted a language not offered on gen 1 but the sound and especially the bass is a definite step up! Also seems to process requests faster.

Love the fact that I can now control things in my home without ever leaving my chair.  Also love that we can have lights come on and off by a schedule for when we are on vacation.  Alexa knows everything!

Purchased this as a compliment to the echo 2 I have for the stereo feature. Great. I could not have asked for more. I would recommend to anyone who has a Echo get something like this to make your system stereo.

We loved our 2nd Gen Echo but irresponsibly left it out on the porch after a party and it got rained on and ruined -- don't do that -- so we ordered a new 3rd Gen to replace it. We are very pleased with the improved sound quality. We use it for so much more than just an attractive compact music speaker: weather report, setting timers, alarms, googling, Alexa's Daily question ... Yes, definately worth the money!

Mic is not as good as my Dots. Audio Quality is really good. I've had to reboot evey few days. Never had to reboot with Gen-1 Echo. It could be  less mic sensitive bc I disabled monitoring for privacy. I may turn monitoring back on to improve mic performance.

We like her voice.  So far we are enjoying Alexa, (RED) edition. Even though the only available internet to us is by satellite, since we live in a 3rd world country here in the US.  Sometime she does not work just right thanks to our very, very expensive internet.
Easy to connect and the sound coming out of the speakers are not as good as high in speaker but still fantastic for this small of a speaker. I really have enjoyed this during the holidays.

Best smart speaker on the market for its price.  You can usually get these on sale for $75.  Don't compare these to Sonos or Bose.  Those speakers are more than double the cost.  For most people, the Echo gen 3 are perfect.  I have 4 of these.  Love them.
Used this product in the bedroom for the wife who loves music everywhere.  The sound is very nice and so far no issues.  Nice compact size and can be placed in several convenient locations

I got it as an upgrade to my old echo. I mainly use it to control lights and play music. It can sometimes not catch what I say but that’s to be expected. Music sounds great on it as it has some quality speakers hidden inside. Overall I’m happy with my purchase.

I love love love the product (RED) color of the device. And there is a bass bump compared to my original Version 1 Echo. I miss the actual turning volume ring, can't remember those buttons in the dark... But it's a great device. And good looking. (I would have preferred the plastic be black, but that's just a taste thing.)
Excellent sound quality in a compact package. Blends nicely into any deco or. When linked  to other devices it provides nice room to room audio through the environment. Love it . . . bgs.

Got this for a Christmas present I’m having so much fun with it all so it has games on it that you comply which I like because it helps your mental capacity to come outside of it so I really thought this machine.

I have many echo devices in my home.  This is the first time that I haven’t been wowed by a new version.  There’s nothing wrong with it, I just don’t notice much difference between the 3rd gen and the 2nd.  The sound seems about the same.

It sits in the Family room , kitchen center of home.  It gets used from all directions it hears timer requests from kitchen 15 feet away. I plays loud music clearly while we pick up. It tells us news and jokes while we sit and relax.
I use it to turn on and off lights and change their colors, and to play music. I love it! Sometimes the voice recognition is a bit spotty but I understand that Alexa will improve over time.

We love all our echo and Alexa devices, We have one in almost every Room and use them on a daily basis this particular 1 I bought for the color and put it in my guest bedroom so they can ask her what time  It is, Or the weather, Or listen to music, I simply love all of our devices❤❤

I love this product. I use it in several ways. Fir example, I ask Alexa for the weather as I'm dressing. I then ask for the top news stories. Instead of fussing with my computer, I only need to ask Alexa.

I bought on black friday or cyber monday so the the 60 bucks I spent was a great price for a decent speaker. I use it for music only so far, and it's fun to have at parties. Everyone takes turns asking Alexa to play their favorite songs.
I really like this echo. It’s great. I use it to listen to music, for an alarm to wake me up, and I use it for any information or questions I need answers to. It answers almost every question.
It is not easily installed when traveling.  Be sure to set it up to use your laptop's mobile hotspot so you can take it wherever you go.  That will take some doiybut you can get it done.
Traded in my 1st generation Echo for this baby and holy mole the sound is perfect for singing along to the Wicked Soundtrack and blaring Metal music throughout the house.  Love this thing!

My wife refuses to use a smart phone but she loved the Alexa devices our daughter has to play music.  This was a gift for my wife and we are limited in what it will do since I'm not going to sync it with my smartphone.  However, it is her favorite Christmas gift and each day she is learning new ways to use it!
Extremely easy to set up.  Sound quality is great.
We love our echo. It has great sound quality for all our musical tastes. We have grocery lists, notifications, and ask her anything she can usually find the answer. We highly recommend.

It been a little frustrating! She keeps dropping the internet and the problem seems to be on her end, not the wireless signal. At one point I called tech support and getting the correct help was more difficult than it should have been in my opinion and didn't do the trick. Alexa works intermittently... we are very disappointed.
I love all my Alexas and I have four plus one in my car. Who cares off they're listening to idle chitchat? There are no State secrets here but if there were is think differently perhaps.

This is my first Alexa device. I bought this one because of the sound quality and it does not disappoint. I use it mainly for music. I’m still learning everything it can do and my kids are enjoying the fun trivia and games.
It's very easy to use for music and has good sound quality. I have purchased some smart plugs but haven't set them up yet. Also, I have not mastered the Alexa app but I'm working on it.

It does what it's supposed to do. Set up 2 rooms with existing Echo Dot through the Alexa app but they don't integrate for full house sound. I think it's because the Dot is connected through a BT soundbar. I don't know.
worth it,I bought it for a Xmas gift to husband he loves it,like also if u accidentally unplug it when u plug it back in it like it never got unplugged kept memory  & internet connection
This is my fourth Alexa.  I have one Dot, 2 2nd generations and this 3rd generation.  It was easy to set up and hook into my Alexa network.  The music quality is better than my other Alexas.

Ordered as it was on sale and hate sound quality of Dot. Had been falling back on my Bose speaker for working out. No longer need to UNLESS I'm accessing Spotify via my phone as does not ge as loud as Bose or accessing Prime music

Love this echo...speaker sound is outstanding,  nice. Compact size.  We have an older, taller one that also has great sound.  We play music frequently on both and Alexa is amazing...one of the Best Buy’s yet!  Highly recommend this item as must-have.  Purchased on cyber Monday.  On sale prices are amazingly affordable.

Not bad for the price. Does all of the Alexa stuff well. Sound quality is good for the price point. Wish it could be a bit louder without distortion. Was thinking of trying the echo sub but I would be concerned that it might overpower the already quiet mid and high audio.

This is the first Alexa I have owned, and so far I love it! I actually wasn’t aware that you had to keep it plugged in at all times, but a friend of mine told me there is a piece you can buy to make it wireless. It’s pretty loud, and Alexa can hear me from distances I thought she wouldn’t be able to. I also really like the mute mic button! I don’t like that you have to pay for music apps if you want to play certain songs, but I knew that before I bought it. Of course that’s not Alexas fault either.
Thanks for the already opened, used product.

I really enjoy this device, set was a snap, Easy to use, and a fantastic sound quality. This was a gift so price isnt something I can comment on, but I would. bowling to buy another one for my home. Only if I do it would be in a different color. Terrific product.

Got this for as a Christmas gift and love it. Alexa is not just a lot of fun, she is a great time saver for getting music and news.  The things Alexa can do seem to be endless. I love that you can sync your security with Alexa, and I love the unlimited available!
It's a great product for the price. I haven't had a single issue in the few months I've owned it. Good recognition and sound. Access to the internet is nice. Answers just about any normal question.

We’ve had ours for about two weeks. Mostly using it for music. Great sound out of such a small unit! Easy to set up and use. You can use your Apple Music subscription with it as well. We have a lot more to learn about what we can use this for.
As near as I can tell, better sound is the only reason to buy an Echo over an Echo Dot. If you're playing music or reading audiobooks, the Echo is probably worth the price increment.

What did I ever do without her?! She helps with everything I need, including my grocery list, Amazon purchases, opening and playing any of my third party apps, and helping to plan different aspects of my day. Love love love! I’ll be purchasing an addition soon enough and continuing to learn more!
This is better than I expected. I own many Alexa devices and this one is the best  Sounding so far a. I also like that it is even smaller than the previous version. I do recommend this speaker.
I ordered this Amazon Echo for my daughter’s room (she’s 23 years old) and she absolutely loves it. Every time she goes to her room she talks to her “Alexa”, they’ve become best friends!:-)

Like the Alexa economy system. It was the Alexa get me into the smart home system. I have a echo and a echo dot 3rd generation. A fire TV 4K. And soon I will automate most of the light to smart light and integrated with Alexa. My family and I like the Alexa to play music, set timer.
This was a gift and the first one in our home.  Love that you get answers to questions right away and especially the way you can listen to music from nearly any radio station you want.
This ECHO pumps out amazing sound. It's a nice size and you can tuck it away in a living room or family room and not have it look out of place. Amazon has built a great product here.

Had an issue with alexa shorting out to where I had to unplug the speaker.  Called CS and they told me all they could do was refund me cause they were not in stock.  Luckily I waited and they were in stock the next day and I was able to replace it! I am truly pleased and would definitely recommend the echo 3rd generation.
Mostly using them for music everywhere in my house but also to start my day with news, weather and traffic reports. Combined with some smart plugs I am controlling multiple devices.
We are so happy with our new Echo. It seems to know what we want before we even ask!
I like it much better than the 2nd generation. The 3rd generation definitely has more bass sound. It does fill in the room with great sound. I plan to buy another one in my bedroom.

Overall, we are impressed with the speaker and the voice recognition feature! The only downside to this speaker is that it is not portable.  It would be a nice feature to add back so the speaker could be moved around the house without turning off.

I really enjoy the Echo. At first, I was a little confused about how to set it up on my phone, but was quickly able to figure it out. I was able to set up my Spotify (must be a Premium member), Amazon music, and I Heart Radio pretty easily. Echo recognizes voice command very well. I rarely have to repeat myself. Also, the sound is pretty nice. I have it set up in my kitchen and I can hear it all throughout my apartment. I would recommend this product.

Impressive sound quality and was a breeze to setup. My wife is jealous because Alexa recognises my accent but either does not recognise her accent or then just ignores her :) Sometimes it's nice to be a man.
I can’t seem to get Alexa to play my music from my playlist on amazon prime. Music I have purchased. The sound, is good, and if I could get it to play my cds I would be so happy!

The Echo is super powerful, given the size of it.  Just put it in one room and will play well with the entire room able to hear it.  Great for when you need something to listen to while doing stuff around the house or other places.  Highly Recommend Product!
Love Love it the sound quality is amazing I purchase a sub Woofer also but with or without the bass it still sounds great I like the echo this is my 3rd one so Zi highly recommend this echo
I would have purchased one much earlier if I had known how useful they were! Works great!! Have my thermostat, weather station, lights, direct tv, music, grocery list, and more connected. Love it!

The choice of colors and redesign of the 3rd Gen Echo is great.  The sound quality is definitely superior to our original Echo and the Alexa integration was so much easier than our initial set-up.  Voice recognition is also solid based upon our history from the first Echo.  We particularly like the outlet stand which eliminates the wire exposure and provides a perfect home away from accidents.
We like it very well, has good sound and tone, we love to listen to music.  It is a joy asking Alexa  a question, like the temp outside,the time and many more questions.  Nice!

It seems we use Alexa as a speaker a lot.  It is so easy to it her to play a song or even play a Sirius Channel.  Also enjoy having it look up information all hands free.  It looks nice and is always ready to perform.  Great price and fast delivery.

Pretty disappointed in this. We have a plus and several dots. I got this to replace a dot with better audio, but well, I’m not convinced the audio is actually better than my several year old dot. It sounds super flat. It goes louder, but that’s about it. Nothing like my echo plus. Really surprised on this one.
Bought for work to have music at the office. Works great when our internet is working. Unfortunately it looses connection often, but I think that’s our internet and not Alexa.
My wife converted an old bedroom to a home gym and added the wall mounted Echo to the environment.  This makes our 4th echo we've placed in our house.  Works and sounds great!
This was a Christmas gift from my son and his family.  The sound quality is excellent, have set reminders, asked questions and still trying to get familiar with all it can do.
Super enjoyment.  Ask the device to play 1940's, classical, or soft rock and the quality of music is well produced and enjoyed.  Christmas present.  Thanks.  Charles Porterfield

As we used our Echo for a lot of our music playlists, we thought the newly designed Echo with what this promised would be much better sound output.  If had to do over, would have just kept first Echo with little difference in sound quality and invested in the Echo Show.

This is a product I didn't know I needed until it was gifted to me. I use it daily for music, cooking times, phone calls, and googling questions. My kids love playing games with Alexa and giving it silly orders. I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality of this speaker. It's loud and clear, high quality!

5 Stars!! - The Echo sounds AMAZING.  I really wish it came in a much large size.  I put one on our nightstand in the bedroom and the deep sounds this things puts out is MUCH better than expected. I only gave 3 stars because of the plug.  Half the time it doesn't work.  It seems to frustrate us more than anything.
Our living room has been filled with the sound of music all day long since we purchased this Echo unit.  There are endless options, love it. Should have bought it sooner.
The new speaker seems to have problems hearing. I can be sitting next to it and it will not answer me but the Echo spots in the other two rooms will answer me. It is frustrating.
Alexa can play music, write a grocery list for you, allow you to have an intercom system in your house and remind you of birthdays or other special dates. It can also set multiple timers.
I love it. I have an echo dot in my bedroom and am considering buying one for my bathroom. There is an interesting wall mount that is also the power supply. It just plugs in.

This is a good assistant but I could not get Alexa to integrate with Spotify and I am paying for both amazon music and Spotify until I figure or get help to figure this out.  Other than that it’s a good digital assistant.
I love the color

I bought this product for my husband for Christmas, I knew that he would have fun playing with all the Many options and fun things he could do. It’s funny because I didn’t realize he would have so much fun that maybe it might annoy me. I’m just kidding lol...This is a wonderful product I’d recommend it for anybody, It’s a lot of fun and it actually helps out a lot plus my husband hasn’t stopped messing around with it for the last three days. He’s happy and that’s all that matters. :)
The sound is crisp, clear and sound great. Sometimes Alexa recognizes our voice but doesn’t answer the question and goes back to sleep after time. It could be user error lol
I held off purchasing the Echo for a few years, but happy I finally made the plunge.  It is so nice to verbally request some actions rather than poke around on the computer.
This was a nice upgrade from my echo dot for my main room. Rich, full sound and ample volume to fill the room. I debated whether or not to upgrade, and I’m not disappointed.
I love the sound quality and color on this. Even the packaging matches. It was easy to unpack and set up with app. I only need to play songs at 20% volume and it sounds awesome.

Got it for Christmas. I really enjoy it, especially the sleep sounds function. What I don’t like is Alexa trying to up-sell me on a Premium membership. Fairly easy to use with the Bluetooth on my iPhone. Shopping lists are very handy, too.
I really only use the Echo for music when I’m cleaning and asking random questions, but the voice recognition and sound quality are great! Great price too, highly recommend
If I would’ve known what I know now I would have purchased an echo a long time ago...how did I ever survive without it..simple to use and it knows and finds anything you need...very happy.!!!
I'm really impressed with the sound quality from these devices and ease of setup and use. Only problem is they occasionally make a beeping sound every few hours. Setting issue?

Got this one for work, it's so nice to connect home & work together. I can turn the lights on at home before I leave work. easy to set up, unlike so many other tech things I have had in the past.  Love technology
A few more features than my 2nd Generation unit that died on me.  We get an enormous amount of use from our Echo's (we have 2) we really wouldn't want to be with out them.
Love this for the small amount of space it uses.  I am using it in my sewing room/office which is pretty tight for space.  Convenient to use for music, news, weather, etc.
Excellant sound quality great bass best of all my alexa's
Alexa is good not great. She often gets things I say wrong and I have to repeat myself. The speaker itself is great. Has nice sound and looks great wherever you put it.

I enjoyed my alexa for about a week before it started messing up.  It seemed to get caught in a cycle that I couldn't get it out of without unplugging the unit and resetting it.  It didn't respond to my voice, it just made a funny noise over and over again like it was shorting out.  Even now, after resetting it, it get glitchy again and again.  One day, it plays a certain music and the next day she says she can't find that.  I have mixed feeling about Alexa.
My Hue lightingighting commands only work when my dot is active not sure why. Otherwise all is good.
Love my Alexa - I am having a relationship with her.  I tell her goodnight every night!  Thought I would have trouble as I am tech inept - no trouble no issues.  Easy to work.

I went from an echo dot to the echo 3. Along the way I also bought a new echo dot current generation. I found that the sound on my new dot to be amazing, not too much difference from the echo 3. That’s were I find that the echo 3 is lacking. Another problem that I’ve recently been noticing is the connectivity is not stable. In several ocasiona, it starts playing a song and abruptly turns off. I’m still not sure what’s going on.
Friends introduced us to Echo while traveling (they take theirs with them), and bought us an Echo for Christmas. Being newbies to it, we are still exploring how to use it.
Everything is great except...Alexa somehow engaged closed captioning on my tv’s and I can’t get it off. Even by taking the app out of our phones and unplugging everything.

This thing is so handy to have around, I bought this one for a gift for a friend.  Anything you need to know is just a question away.  It sounds great and I'm not constantly having to charge a portable speaker to sync to my ipad or other devices for music.
Our first echo and we are very pleased with it. Get up in the mornings and say "Alexa play some christian praise music" The sound is excellent. I'm glad we bought it !!!

I love the 3rd generation echo !!! Really highly recommend it ! The sound of the speaker is better than echo dot !!! I love the heather grey color , didn’t have problem hooking it up , this our second one . Would definitely buy again , fast shipping and wonderful product .
Absolutely love it. Purchased with echo dot and two smart plugs. Now I can tell my coffee maker to turn on from my bed. Love that Alexa plays music with no commercials or reminds me to call people.

I needed a new echo for another room in my home, I replaced the old one with the new one in my bedroom.  Everything seems to work fine but the bass seems to be more active than in the old one and makes music and voice with P sounds boom too much.

I’m loving this device. I’ve wanted an Alexa for a while now so it’s nice to finally have one! It’s simply and ease to use. All you have to do is plug it in and bam! Instant help or news or just weather report. Whatever you’ll use your Alexa for, I’m sure you’ll enjoy it!
Better sound than the first generation and much less sinister looking, especially in the blue.  I still think Alexa could sound more real.  Glad I traded in my old one.

the sound is great when synced with the echo sub and a second echo for stereo sound. But there is a glitch where sometimes only one plays . i have to stop it and walk to the other echo and restart the play. also have it play different musics. . but when its not glitchin its great.
Combined my Alexa with smart sockets (Gosund ) have made my dumb lights smart. Easy to control lights in separate rooms. Still learning all Alexa can do. Pleased so far

Bought as gift for son. He has been unable to get Double Jeopardy on it.  I chatted with customer support, I was given instructions about resetting skill, I forwarded info, it still didn’t work. He said it was going to be additional $2.99 a month.
I got this product on Black Friday for a really great price. I am impressed with how well Alexa understands what we say. We listen to a lot of music on it. Sounds good!

I love this version of Alexa. I have the original echo as well. The biggest difference between this echo and the 1st gen is probably voice recognition, its can really pick up voices even while music and or audiobooks are playing. The next best improvement is probably sound quality, the bass of this echo is impressive. I haven't needed to push the volume past 6 for music and 4 for audiobooks. This is a very good gift for the right person. Or even yourself. Highly recommended.

I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she really likes it.  I like it too.  I got the smart outlet/plug and a lamp for her and it’s works really well.  Very pleased with this product. She wishes it was wireless, hopefully they’ll come out with a wireless one soon.

This small speaker packs a big punch!  The sound quality is remarkable and somehow even better than my first generation smart speaker.  Alexa's a.i. is still light-years away from Google, so the value is definitely in the sound technology.

Instant variety of music at my command via voice requests across the room. No turning on stereo equipment, browsing through tapes, records and CD's. Also, requests for information instantly. Although not all my questions have been answered. That is disappointing and going to the library or my computer still does the job. Maybe the Echo data base will eventually expand and those questions will be answered? Otherwise, I'm content for now.
Buggy version. In stereo mode. Each time i use a command, there's a squeal before the music starts every time. The left channel led ring stays on a lot.
The 3rd generation unit has the best sound yet and is very 3 dimensional. Easy to set up and communicate with. Should have bought a couple more for gifts at the time of the deal!

My child often is able to turn ask Alexa to turn off and on (he thinks it's funny) Sound quality is really good for the small size, love that it doesn't take up a lot of space. Individual son's won't play unless you pay for Alex's unlimited but it can play radio stations and music for iHeartRadio for free.
Love it!  I upgraded from dot (which now resides in another room) and loving the sound!!!! Omgosh wish is done this long ago!  Very responsive and have had no issues.

Alexa’s a pretty funny lady 👍 I’m actually just learning how to use my Echo, and so far it’s working out. I like asking Alexa to play songs by artists, which it shuffles up a mix from Apple Music, then I’m good to go for hours. Since I only have one, I’ll probably get another one at some point  so that I don’t need to move it between up/downstairs.

This is my first Alexa. I absolutely love it. We have the lights integrated with it and it turns them all off at night or when I leave the house. Not to mention, she keeps my 7 year old daughter happy with all her knock knock jokes.
I bought his for my mom who is becoming forgetful. I can ask Alexa to remind my mom of doctors appointment and ask it to play music for her anytime ahead of time. It’s great. Great sound.
Great sound quality! I have the first generation Echo and these were much nicer in design and sound quality! Got a great deal during Black Friday. Highly recommended!

This is my first smart home device that ties all of my plugs, bulbs, etc together. However, my unit makes random noises sometimes and sometimes it's enough to wake me up in my sleep... not sure why or what they mean. Not even sure what it is that provokes it but sometimes I get very frustrated!! Most of the time, the unit picks up my call for "ALEXA" pretty consistently and easily, which I enjoy much better than my iphone's SIRI!!!!
I like this far-better than my DOT primarily because I’d the high quality sound.  It’s comparable to a Bose product frankly.  The value in the speaker alone is great.
easy to set up great sound

We really like the look ...we already have an Alexa..tall and black... but this one looks cuter. I have to say though, our old Alexa seemed to understand better...and we had to sign up for a new billing to have ALL the songs we want played...somthing we already had signed up for on our old Alexa.... other than that..we are enjoying it
There is so much that Alexa can do, we have barely scratched the surface. But I'm learning... not just commands but the setup and condition with my other devices. But I like it! And will add more!
The echo technology is the best thing since bubble gum! I have four of them, the one pictured is in my kitching. Amazon is the leader in this technology of smart speakers!
These units do not work with computer (either Mac or PC). You can only use iOS or Fire to set it up. Very disappointing, as we prefer a large computer screen for low-vision.

Sound quality is great new gen are having issues dropping in with some devices and you have to call instead of being able to drop in kind of aggravating however it’s not a deal breaker for my household
Christmas gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it.  I didn't realize how many things the Echo does,  now I need to buy another for my other child. :0) great gift..
I have Gen 1 and 2 and so far this one is my favorite. It's not as tall as Gen 1 and a little wider than 2.  It has good sound and works well with voice recognition

I was looking to start building a smart home and received this as a gift. I give it 4 stars because I have some security / privacy concerns from Amazon itself. As far as the device goes... it works wonderfully! Sound is clean and crisp, and no issues with voice recognition. Integration with a smart plug was pretty seamless and works reliably. It works so well we are getting a Echo Dot for another room
Our new Echo 3rd Gen. is a very noticeable upgrade from our Echo Dot. The Echo Dot was adequate but the Echo 3rd gen. is definitely better. A worth while purchase.
We still have a lot to learn about all the the possible use of Alexa.  Making shopping list , asking questions and information but it is all positive. Great purchase.
The sound is good from the echo
I wanted to add color to my living room so I purchased another Echo 3 gen. Alexa is great as ever but the color red, I'm not sure it's red it's more a faded full red

The way we use it, it's basically a notice-board/calendar/radio, and it's rather good for all that. There are times when she misunderstands the intent of a question, and I wish she didn't try to give helpful hints quite so often. Overall, I'd say she's not quite as smart as Google assistant, but not bad to have around. Also, it would be nice if she had more than just the one voice.

Gave it to my GF for Christmas.  She was not sure she wanted it.  But after getting home and installing it, she fell in love with it.  Controlling her TV, music, light switches, etc. became the basis of her life!

Para mi uso personal, muy bueno un producto de excelente calidad, pero mi recomendación es que deberían tener en youtube un video en español para que expliquen que se puede hacer con Alexa o cuales son las funciones que se le puede pedir por ejemplo yo compré adicional dos Fire Stick y me aparecen en el app de Alexa los dos con mi nombre y no se como aparecieron allí y que puedo hacer con ellos con Alexa, por eso hablo de un video explicativo, o que tiene que ver Alexa con los Fire Stick.
This thing is great I have it on all the time by Christmas music through the holidays and this morning I started out with Hank Thompson where else could you find that

I bot the echo primary for music. The quality of the sound is superb for such a small unit. The echo worked fine for a week or so then it would freeze up almost daily. I would unplug it and let it reset and it would work for another day or so. Amazon sent me a new one and it works much better but it to will freeze up every now and then. I think there is an issue with this new echo. I love the sound but be aware you may have to unplug it and let it reset occasionally.

We got two of these. I should have gotten 4. They pack a lot of sound in the small package. I love that I can use the headphone port in the back for either a line in or line out. I currently have a projector plugged into one and it works perfectly.

For the price you pay, it’s worth it. Keep in mind, there is little  bass on this, like if your looking for a deep sounding bass this IS NOT going to provide you with that (you’ll have to purchase their subwoofer to get quality bass). Overall it does a great job, sometimes it may not not recognize your voice but I guess it’s always learning and adapting. No product is perfect but this is worth a shot at. Love the color though.
I am still learning to use this. I like it.
I bought this for my 5 year old grandson, who is full of questions and loves music!  One of my favorite Christmas gifts! Great sound! Easy to use!  Versatile! Parents loved it too!
This new generation of echoes is very intuitive and connects much more quickly. It is also more reliable and does not disconnect repeatedly as past versions did.
I really like my Alexa- setting timers, quick fact checks and of course music is my go to uses - but I’m sure Alexa will be used for many other ways as I get use to having her about!

I had a hard time to get this Echo Gen 3 connected to public wifi, even the technical support could not figure out the problem. My Echo Gen 2 is working just fine. I did the software update but the problem still remains. Sound quality not far superior to generation 2 Echo.
This is an amazing product to have at home.  It does everything I need.  It’s like having my own assistant and the sound quality is great, especially with music!
Working. I had to unplug and restart once because it recognized the request, however no music asked for came out. Unplugged restarted and everything came along correctly.
The first thing I noticed about these new echo speakers, is the bass. I thought they were drowning out my sub but no, they are just great. Job well done Amazon.
This was a gift, I love it.  Had fun so far listening to all kinds of music.  From Sinatra, Benny Goodman band to the Beatles.  Great sound.👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
I have been extremely happy with my Echo and all that it can do.  I am still learning but I am amazed at the capabilities of Alexa.  I can't wait to continue on.
This was an upgrade from gen 1.  The sound is a bit better.  That’s about it.  I also like the shorter speaker.  Gen 1 is still around just exiled to the bathroom.
Huge improvement in acoustic properties over version 1, it even seems to listen better.  Slightly smaller more bookshelf form factor that blends in to the room.

I have several of these all over the place. This one is in the stable and we use it all the time. It's great for music and whatever questions we might have from general information to weather reports. It's easy to make calls on too... perfect companion!

I like being able to listen to music while cleaning or doing my hobbies.  I  can ask Alexa to play a specific song or genre of music.  This allows me to hear my favorites without having to change the music every other song.  However, every now and then,  Alexa doesn't understand what I am saying.  This can be frustrating.  Luckily, it doesn't happen often.

The Echo 3rd generation was easy to start up, has great sound and voice recognition. I have not had to use tech support so I can not comment on that. The thing I love the most is the red color, so pretty!

I use this Echo to listen to podcasts.  The sound is clear and I can set the volume for my.listening pleasure or for those in my household who have a hard time hearing. The Echo was a surprise Christmas gift.

After three weeks it would not play music from Amazon or Pandora. So I returned it. I wanted to order a new one but I never received the 20% off for pre-ordering and the person I talk to said that promotion was no longer available. Since I never received it to begin withI would’ve thought an exception could be made
better than I expected
Speaker has a big boom for the buck! My favorite so far. It’s kinda hard to connect the tv to it and the sub and disconnect but its definitely my favorite echo.

I did not intend to buy the Echo 3 for myself. It was going to be a Christmas present for someone else, but I found the free trial of Amazon music was linked to my account. I decided to keep it, and I have throughly enjoyed it.  It is so helpful and easy to use.This comes under the category of being something for a person that you think you might like. I did and I use it everyday. Merry Christmas to me!
This was a replacement for a 3rd Gen that made a popping sound after responding to a command. The replacement performs with no popping and we're enjoying it.
It took me a week to build up to installing my ALEXA ECHO. Once I decided to do it, I was surprised how easy it was. I’m glad I got it, love playing with it.
I have 3 (3rd Gen ) Alexa's and have them synced to play all together.  The sounds I get from room to room are amazing.  I might get another one for the den.
I live in an area that radio reception is limited.  My Alexa is just perfect for my needs and keeps me company.  Looking forward to using all of the features.
This is my favorite echo device. I have several and the value to get the smart plug is also a great deal. I bought them for both my kids too and they love it
My mom loved her 3rd gen echo dot, just wanted Abit more volume, this was my solution for her, she is impressed with the increased volume and sound quality.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for my brother. He loves it. It works and sounds great and it’s a cool color. I have the dot but will be getting this for myself soon.
I love my echo, and I love having Alexa to take care of things as fast as I think of them, like adding things to my shopping list and creating an alarm or timer.

Very difficult to connect to Spotify premium. It will only work on Bluetooth but then Alexa won’t work. Change default to play Spotify and still playing amazon music. If I ask Alexa to play Spotify, it plays free Spotify, and not premium account. You can’t change Spotify music in the Alexa app, only Amazon music. I purchased google home instead and much more satisfied. This Alexa is a waste of money. Wish I could leave less than one star.

I love my echo ❤️. It’s really like having a smart house. “Alexa, add Avocados to my grocery list. Alexa, play my most recent playlist. Alexa, let’s workout! Alexa, turn on my lights when I get home.” Alexa has really optimized my life. The alarm is nice two. I work two jobs and the alarm wakes me right out of what would have been a 12 hr snooze. The accommodating app is nice too. It’s like having Alexa in your pocket. I highly recommend.
Love the sound,  if you have a medium size living room and you dont have a portable speaker, this echoe is what you need to listen to spotify or amazon music.
I switched from another home assistant to Alexa mostly due to the audible compatibility. Still getting to. know Alexa. The sound seems just as great in my dots as this larger speaker.
Wanted another Echo for my bedroom and this was the current model. Sound is improved from my first one, fits nicely with room decor and was easy to set up.
This is my 4th unit and by far, the most frustrating. She just doesn’t listen very well compared to our other ones. The sound is great, no complaints there.
The set-up was a breeze and the sound that comes out is unbelievable. I have bought (4) including mine and have given the others to family members. They love it. 👍🏽👏🏽👌🏽
Ordered two - based upon family members advice and it was an excellent idea. Two of them make my whole house sound exceptional! Holiday music never sounded so good!
While we don't use Alexa for more than a radio,  we are very pleased with the quality of sound.  Specifically compared to Echo dot and previous generation (3) of Alexa.
We love our Echo! This has great sound, way better than I thought it would! Only issue is we have to restart it about once a week. Not sure if its the wifi, the plug, or the unit.

I love the sound and capability of the echo smart speaker. I got a second one so that I could have coordinated sound in my upstairs and downstairs. Love this feature as well as all of the others but.... my two speakers stopped being synchronized. I'm sure it is a simple fix but at this point, I'm not sure how to correct the problem. You'd be surprised at all of the things Alexa can do. So fun. Love the "lists" and getting the morning news updates as well.
Why didn’t I get this earlier. Love the rich sound. Each morning we get the weather, news briefing and then some selected music. Happy with this product.
So far this Alexa has been one of my best investments. It does so much and I have only begun to unlock the potential it has. I’m excited to see what else I can hook up to it.
Didn’t want it in my house, now we love it!! Convenient, so easy to set up 5 yr old could do it, grouping lights are a piece of cake as is the dot set up, and it’s actually pretty fun to have around!
It randomly short circuits about once every 2-3 days. I need to unplug it do to a bug causing it to suddenly sound like an old school cd playing over a ton of scratches

I can’t believe I waited this long to join the Alexa ranks! This works very well. I use it to listen to music, blogs, get weather reports, get information from the web, get package notifications, and so much more. I haven’t used the smart plug yet. I’m still trying to decide where I want it.
Works great for some smart home products, but not all. Also if you are planning on using these as speakers, don’t. The blue tooth is the absolute worst.
I am completely satisfied with this new Echo. Very good sound from a speaker this size. I paired it with a Sub and it sounds great. Alexa works very well and is getting better all the time.
The sound quality on this unit has been improved from the previous generation.  The color I wanted kept getting back ordered so I just ordered the grey.

The product is awesome. However, I messed up somehow when I activated it using my Alexa AP. It is seeing three units instead of two, so I can’t get the units to communicate with each other. It keeps telling me one of my Alexa units is offline. My error.....but frustrating.
So far I have enjoyed it.  It’s in my bathroom.  I just ordered the dot as I think it will better served in a different room.  The sound quality is “AMAZING”.
I was surprised by the quality of the speaker. Great sound comes from this little device. Alexa is easy to use and she has done everything I have asked of her.

Great product! Always room for improvement, as there are still some ways you can say things that Alexa won’t recognize. I also didn’t appreciate that she can’t skip multiple songs ahead, but that might just be me. Voice recognition is surprisingly good, although she can often mistake other words for her name. I was impressed with the amount of little tricks Alexa can do, like telling stories and singing songs. Altogether a great device, but improvement is always an option.
I got it as a gift and it integrates well into our home.  My wife is predominantly the one who uses it.  It recognizes both our voices pretty smoothly.

I've actually used my device almost exclusively for music, the feature that attracted me to it.  I really appreciate being able to summon up a group or artist in my mind and almost instantly be listening to his/her/their songs.  Alexa has also answered a few questions about weather, store hours, and such.  She's pretty convenient, I must admit, even though I was reluctant to have her in my home.

The sound quality is better than the first generation. I feel like it occasionally does not pick up when I'm taking to it... Not sure if I'm not loud enough, or not saying Alexa in the right cadence, but once in a while I need to repeat the wake phrase.
Better than 2nd Gen. Great Bass awsome sound. Paired with fire stick for sound, highly recommend using for movies and sports. Volume 3 is loud, volume 6 is really loud. Love the speaker.

I didn't want Alexa -- but my daughters gave it to me for Christmas.  I keep it in my kitchen/family room.  It's nice coming home from work and requesting music - etc... while I'm settling in to make dinner or read a book!
I bought this for my mom that wants to hear music through the kitchen and living room. She loves it and has already asked Alexa to play some Bruno Mars.
I love this Limited addition read on the echo speaker. i’m really big about getting items that are limited or special edition. The red is vibrant and deep.
What can I say? Alexa knows all my secrets, and now I get creepy ads for things I have mentioned in my kitchen. The audio quality is great, and I use it to control a few devices around the house.

This is my first Echo and I loved it! It’s Alexa assistant is amazing and combined with several cheap wifi Bulb adapters from iHaper and one Lifx Mini, I was able to build my Starter Smart Home. I just ordered two small Echo Dots for the other rooms!

The verdict is still out on this Smart Speaker!  I love to listen to music on it and it cuts in and out.  I don’t think it is my wifi.  When it cuts out I ask Alexa to play the radio station again.  My music comes back on and the process is repeated.  I like sound that comes through on the speaker.  My first Alexa only lasted 8 months and the sound was awful.  This 2nd time I bought a better quality Alexa.  Hopefully it will last longer.  Thank you!
I was looking for a rechargeable speaker not one that you had to leave plugged in, it was a nice speaker but just not what I was looking for as a speaker???
Our alexa dot stopped working and we wanted better sound.  It is so nice to have the Alexa to play music and sound great too!  Great base!  Really like it.

Very intuitive product.  Would recommend for both beginners and avid home integration customers and anyone who just wants some good music on demand.  If you are serious about sound I would recommend the optional sub woofer.  This is going to be one of my next purchases.
3rd gen echo has better base and sound at a higher volume. It’s shorter and wider than gen 2 and has some kind of fabric around it which gives a better look

I have an Echo Dot that I use daily, actually leave on and change stations in morning and night time. I use the Echo much in the same manner as it is located where I stay most of the day, great company!
All I had to do was plug it in and it literally set itself up.  I already had the Echo dots but I wanted a louder speak so that I could listen to my books on tape on room, the sound is awesome.
