I'm loving it.  My wife is jealous.  She sad the B---h is just too smart. Lol!!! Everyone that I have introduced to Echo loves it and wants to buy one.
The sound quality is awesome. I love all the features, way too many to list! This is my second Echo and I am pleased with the product. Highly recommend!

Ever since we brought it , we a having lots n lost of fun with. My kids loves To talk Alexa n ask her educational questions. A great buy. Help me me stay on track with my daily busy routine. We love it n we order three more so yeay.
I received this for a Christmas gift.  I don’t yet have a “smart” house.  I do enjoy the music very much.  Great sound quality.  The jokes are fun!
This has great sound for my shop! I made the stand

I am still learning what the Echo offers. I paired it to 3rd party plugs.. Too bad Alexa doesn't have a preferred brand that didn't need to download 3rd party app..but hey it works well... Nest requires you to merge to Google account.. another thing I had to create as well. lots more to learn and setup.

This is a review for that smart plug that was included.... the Alexa device was a gift so I cannot test To put it simply, the plug is trash. It delays or refuses to turn on 4 out of 5 times and I have tried multiple low amp devices plugged in. The only perk is the rectangular shape. I would almost have preferred NOT receiving the plug
The sound is so much better than with the previous Echo. More bass and better sound overall. Like the more compact size and I bought the battery base to make Alexa more portable. Very pleased !!!
I was hesitant at first, but I have now fallen in love with my echo. I would definitely recommend this product. The sound quality is great and was easy to setup.

In adding this unit, I have 1 echo and 3 dots, several of my apps have become non functional.  I've put in trouble ticketd with no response on the app, so I don't know if it is a problem with the app or the echo, but something isn't playing nicely together.  It works fine on a lot of things. I can't find the problem to fix it
I’m so glad I moved forward with upgrading from Echo 1! Sound quality is superior and fills my room incredibly well. Sound is clearer and the bass in songs sound great. Definitely recommend.

I recently had a Google Home Mini that took a crap on me. So I decided to switch teams and get an Echo. This thing overall is tremendously better than my mini and I am very happy with my decision. The bass is good it sounds great does everything I need it for and looks great!

My only compliant about it but I’m no tech guy is that it constantly has to be plugged in to work but other than that for its size, the loudness and sound quality are really amazing. It’s connects to Bluetooth almost instantly. I haven’t had any issues with it

It is a decent product depending on the application.  Everything worked as advertised but the quality of the sound was not better then the echo dot.  I wanted to use mine in the garage but the echo just couldn’t carry enough sound or volume like I wanted.
I like getting up and asking for easy listening music, It also so says good morning. My wife use's it all day for info and music. Worth the money.
único que no me trabajo Samsung nokia 8  Pero esta bien me gusta lo puse con la computadora Y pongo todo el día la música cristiana que me gustó
This is one of the best Alex is out there! Sounds great not deep base like some Alexis all you here is the base. Another black Friday super buy!

We are really enjoying the ease of use and the great sound quality that comes from this little device.  It's wonderful to be able to call up a favorite song or ask Alexa for the weather without needing to search it on a computer or other device.

Better sound than the generation 2. Alexa works ok. I like the rounded top look. If you already have Alexa setup in your house adding these is super easy from the app. Came a day early straight from Amazon. I’d recommend them but I’m nobody so get one if you want.
You have to blast the sound to hear any difference in sound quality from the echo 2. At normal sound levels, it’s hard to hear any distinction.
This is my first echo speaker and I’m impressed how good it is i also bought a echo show5 really enjoying them the sound is really good and loud
Great for music; not so good/audible for the human voice. We were disappointed the speakers had no adjustment controls. Human voice is muffled.
I like the easy access to music, appliances and plugs (control on/off, timers), and internet, but disappointed with connecting to TV for sound.
Love the speakers (I bought two and paired them.) The stereo sound is full. Great clarity. The separation is perfect. What’s not to like?
Great sound! Still miss the turn-dial volume control of the original Echo. I wanted this to be pairable with the Echo 2 at minimum. Boo. Hiss.

I have a couple of Amazon Dots that I love but now my hearing is a little wonky so my son suggested I upgrade to this. I love it. The sound is great, much easier to hear than the Dot. My only complaint is Alexa herself sometimes not understanding me which is why I only gave this a 4.
I have two as left and right TV speakers.  They sound much better than the TV speakers.  They fill the room with sound.  Better sound than the echo dot.

This is a handy speaker that has great sound quality. Alexa is very helpful as well and setting up the Amazon smart plug was seamless.  I love listening to amazon music as well. Most of the time Alexa can understand song titles even if you don't quite know the exact name. All in all so far I have had a great experience with this Echo. Oh yeah, the twilight blue is a great color also.
So far it has way too many times when it just doesn’t work? I use it only for music and nothing else. Yet their have been daily times when it just doesn’t work.
Our son set it up for us, but we need to read the manual to see all that Alexa can do.  I'd like her to change channels on the TV; we'll see!
This little number packs so much capability. Plays every song we’ve asked for.  Will tome how long your cookies are baking. Looks up historical data. And tells jokes!
Echo 3rd Gen. is great, great sound, easy set up, easy to use. Looks good in my family room. Better sound than my dots . Smaller than earlier versions.
Good upgrade from a dot, does not pick up commands well, 2/5 commands will be wrong. The bass blows the mid tones out, only buy when on sale.
Red color is very nice,  Alexa works great with this speaker.... sound quality is fantastic. Added the subwoofer and it sounds incredible!!!
Voice recognition works very well.  Audio from the device sounds great.  With the volume of the device turned up loud, Alexa can still hear your voice at a normal level and responds accordingly.
Each day, I find something new that Alexa can do. The sound is great and I’m sure after a few more weeks, I’ll be using my echo to it’s fullest potential.

Speaker goes unresponsive and emits a faint white noise crackelint sound like a radio station not quite tuned in - Have had to reset speaker 3 times already by unplugging it and plugging it back in. Otherwise - happy
Echo is easy to set up. Echo answers questions immediately and plays songs just by asking. I don't know why I waited so long to get one.
Sometimes when changing songs while listening to music with it, or changing apps/skills it will randomly shut off.  Not a deal breaker, just an annoyance.
We already have Echo dots in the house, so familiar with Alexa and capabilities. Wanted the Echo for the patio. The sound quality is amazing!
Using this to wake my husband up the days he goes to an Active Day program for dementia patients. I can step out of the picture and let the echo take over.
I was slow to get one but I really like it. The sound is amazing. Nice to have it voice activated. She’s not perfect but neither am I. Works for me.

Sound quality of this device is great compared to second generation. However, device stops streaming music after just a few songs. Then randomly, sometimes hours later, begins playing  again. I called tech support , they were aware of the problem but unable to fix it. Had to unplug the device at night because it again playing music in the dead of night. Hopefully Amazon corrects the problems soon.
The first one I got made a clicking sound after it played a sound or Alexa talked. I sent it back and got a new one and the new one was fine.
I wanted bass and I got it but its ALL bass, not enough treble, if I'm saying this right, I still love it as I still love my first generation
Everything seemed to work good with the Echo helping me set up. I still have to look at the tutorial so I can get as much value as I can from it.
Much better microphone than 1st gen. You can have it hear the Alexa word with music playing. However, even though sound quality is a bit better, it is not as loud as 1st gen.
There is nothing to not like about this speaker. I had another one that went on the blink and I received this as a Christmas gift and I'm very happy with it so far. No complaints!
I have 5 of these. I have clients who just bought a new smart home and they did not have an Echo so I ordered one for them.  They love it!
Information (e.g. temperature, weather, general questions), music, amusement. My daughter gets a kick out of the answers to some of her silly questions.
We use our voice to hear any music we like. Perfect for our needs. We also ask a lot of random questions and the answers are quick and succinct.
Sound quality and voice recognition have improved in the 3rd generation. Music sounds better and responses are more clear than 2nd generation.
Love Alexa products! Have most of my lights connected. Only thing I wish for is that all the accessories could connect via Bluetooth for when wifi goes out.
Omg I love this and it’s worth the price just because the alarm clock feature and how loud it is. If you have difficulty waking up, set a timer on this and an alarm and you will wake up.
We updated our original Echo Dot which we've had for a number of years. Sound was awful. The sound on this new Echo was exactly what I wanted
I love being able to make music all over my house at a reasonable volume. Great value for the audio quality, will probably get more in the future!
The echo comes in handy for so many things, as a timer, weather report, score of a game, what time my favorite show comes on..... amazing!!
I love the Echo devices. I keep find new places to use them. Garage, Echo Show in kitchen, I put this in my office do to the larger speaker.

I purchased the unit for my Husband as a Christmas gift. It was very easy to set up once we got it connected to the internet. Had some problems with that but I think it is our network, not the unit. Speaker is nice, Alexa responds well even from other rooms. It has made a very nice addition to the house!

My new Alexis is doing the same thing as my old one. She shuts down after about an hour of playing music and when I tell her to p!ay something else immediately she says"sorry Amazon shut down because it didn't detect any activity". I'm sitting in same room knitting or reading and it's really iratating!
I have two echo dots and now this it is absolutely amazing it has very good bass and clear sound, I find the speech Recognition very good
Love the sound and the fact I can play a lot of music without my CDs. Also I can turn on and off with my voice. Purchased mostly for entertainment.

Volume is amazing, sound quality is great. What amazes me most is how Alexa can hear me over the loud music playing through it. I have this in our large living area and it easily fills the space. Great buy

I have this in my bedroom. And I love it. I listen to music a ton and the sound quality is really great. I check the weather and traffic in my area every morning. I also bought a show for my kitchen! Love that too!
Nice little unit, works as described but sounds so much better than the dots which is what I had been using.  Perfect for playing music while I work, thinking of ordering a second one.

Excellent support! This was a gift for my husband. On Xmas day he had trouble setting it up. He called the support # I was given at purchase. The person solved his problem quickly and pleasantly. We were surprised at the service during the holiday. He loves his gift, uses it to check the weather every day and to listen to music.
It’s ok. It’s not as good as the show. Not even for sound quality or voice recognition. Overall I think it’s kind of a stupid waste of money.
Loud enough. Enough bass w/o needing a subwoofer. Clarity is excellent. Running Amazon Music, which is now using FLAC files. Sound great.
I bought to replace an echo dot. This unit cannot hear me from the same distance as the dot and it has more trouble understanding than the dot.
Great with smart lightbulb to turn on lamp. Great with smart plug to turn on other things. Fun family games and nice speaker for music.

Got this for my 89 year old grandma for Christmas and she loves it. After giving her a list of common things to do, she was quickly able to figure out how to get her favorite music, news, weather, drop in to other Alexas in the house, etc...the family has been using it to stream music and play games.
Great buy, our second echo and love its functionality and all around features only issu is integration with other products which can be improved
We bought two of these along with the subwoofer and are amazed at the big sound from these little guys. Very happy with this purchase.

Got this as a gift.  Although I still have the last gen, this has much better sound and deeper base.  Mic does not seem as responsive, and sound level is controlled by buttons as opposed to simply twisting ring.  But it still has a fairly good control of sound level.  Also looks better.

Absolutely amazing! Alexa is sooo useful, for a while I had been wanting her but when I finally obtained an Echo it came with more features than I ever imagined. I use Alexa every day; her usefulness knows no limits!! :D Also I got the Red version, and the color is beautiful!
I have the Echo Dot and wanted to upgrade it. The Echo Dot is definitely smarter. Perhaps I have a defective unit but I am returning it
Love it.  I use it for music, timers and shopping lists.  Works the best.  I am sure I have just scratched the surface of her potential.
Alexa and I are learning but the overall quality is much improved.  Speakers sound much better and I think there is a big difference in quality.
Easy set up and outstanding sound quality compared to the older versions. While it may not be a big deal for some, the newer generation units are much better looking too.
Sound quality is where is this unit shines— much better than the previous echo versions, which I actually really liked!  Better than most Bluetooth units on the market, just not as portable...
Limited music player interface. It's not very good that it's only limited to certain music streaming apps.  Would love to use YouTube music for more specific music listening choices.
Still learning, but I liked it enough to purchase the dot.  Now my kid can listen to her music in her room and I can listen to mine .
Set up is painfully easy!!  😊  Audio quality is very nice, and basic equalizer functions can be "ordered" verbally, and it responds.  It looks nice and just works.  We like it!
I really love my Alexa. It is unreal how smart she is. She will even play the music I like and the sound was really good, even the bass.

Our first generation Echo had an option to adjust the volume by turning the top, the third generation does not. However, the sound quality is much better and the volume control buttons on top work just fine and the voice command can be used without manually controlling the adjustment.

Very happy with my purchase of the Amazon Echo 3rd Generation.  The voice recognition is amazing without any training needed. The sound quality is very good for this size speaker.  The number of Skills is fantastic.  Will recommend this smart speaker to friends and family.
Sometimes Alexa doesn’t know the answer. She doesn’t talk unless you say ‘Alexa. But this echo sounds great & connected to my WiFi right away!
I love the Alexa Echo.. I also have the Dot .. The sound on the Echo is fantastic
Impressive improvement over Gen2
Even if you have a stereo on one room, this is a great speaker to listen to music in the other room. Much better than the echo dot.

I really love Alexa. here lil funny story though. So i was on call with a friend of mine and i was in kitchen cooking. she has alexa to. I ask alexa if she knew how many mins put someone on to cook for my alexa claim she didnt know but my friend  had me on speaker and her alexa told me. That sooo funnny! I told my Alexa now why you couldnt tell me why yo twin sister had tell me through phone LOL
The echo will not hear the trigger word from time to time. The plug (alone) is TO DAMN EXPENSIVE at 25 dollars. As a bundle I should have purchased more than I did.
I bought the Alexa because i wanted a newer one. I don't regret it all.  My daughter uses it as an alarm and she asks Alexa so many questions.  She uses it as a learning tool.
I was very pleasantly surprised at the good sound quality. I’m definitely purchasing another and the sub-woofer for great 2.1 sound.

Voice recognition and other features work as well as other models. However, this unit freezes often.  It just stops working during extended (several hours) music or book playback.  You have to unplug the unti to solve the problem.
Purchased this to have one in our condo at the beach and it setup easily and sounds great! Very happy with the quality all around.
Love the light, plug, Xbox and tv voice controls. I can now easily turn all appliances off(so can the kids, no more “I forgot to turn the lights off”.
Great sound and she responds well to questions or requests. It would be nice if it could have a wireless option to bring outside.
Great sound from this speaker - I have several dots and added an echo to get bigger sound in our basement I was not disappointed.

Like the fast response time, Recognization of different voices, how easy it was to connect sound is pretty powerful as well. Clear sound love that it works with many different apps and music programs. Use mine with Apple Music but has many options.
Purchased this to replace my 1st gen echo that just stopped connecting to my internet after several years of use. It's super handy!
You have to keep telling what you want Twice or three times before it’ does it is annoying. But when the musics plays sounds excellent but deal breaker you have To repeatedly say it again 🙄
The vocal side of the speaker sounds like a tweeter in a bucket. Even after you adjust the equalizer it sounds like a small speaker in a bass tube.
This is a really nice upgrade to the echo dot that we had. Still does all the normal things but with a much better sound system.
Great integration, very pleased with sound quality compared to my 1st gen.  Pics up my voice from around the corner very easily.

My wife had the 1st one when it came out. Wow what a difference from the 1st 1 to this 1 she loves everything about it in the sound quality is actually amazing. She has 70% of our lights control by Alexa including plugs as well and NO hub required

Pros: Looks cool, great sound and good features. Cons: Doesn't curse. Gets things completely wrong, for example: I said "Play Juular by Devin Townsend Project", and she says "ok, playing Thriller by Michael Jackson", how is that even remotely close, and not even the same genre. And this is irritating, she wants to play some mainstream you never heard of when you are asking for classics made by great musicians.

I previously purchased two Echo Dots and wanted to give the Echo a try. Everything was fine, great sound and look. But it completely died after one week. The power supply was just fine (18v), but no lights/response and it was also plugged into a surge protector. Amazon support was awesome to work with. It has been returned and new one has been shipped. I wonder if I just got a lemon?
Sounds are real good. I bought 2 of these and make them as one pair left and right,  works perfect and sound so good in my store.
Fantastic revision! Hands down the best Echo to date. The sound quality is very good with nice bass. I definitely recommend this Echo.

Honestly, the best speaker I've ever purchased. Bought it on Black Friday and it has been amazing. "Alexa, set an alarm for 8AM" "Alexa, play _ on Spotify" "Alexa, turn on TV" (after I've linked it to my Samsung TV) It has very clear sound quality and doesn't sound mumbled when volume is maxed. Looking forward to buying the smart lights, items to sync her with the entire house.
I got this as a Christmas present and I absolutely love it!! Especially with the smart bulbs I bought, I am not sure why I didn’t get one sooner
I am enjoying learning new things Alexa can do each day. I have integrated it with my lights and music so far. Looking forward to many more functions.
From time-to-time Amazon offers one the ability to purchase an Echo and then add-on a smart-plug for what is effectively about $5.00.

Alexa is great and Amazon has such a wide range of music and things to choose from that makes her so good. I love everything about her except at least once a week she gets crackly and can’t be understood. Unplugging and replugging does the trick.
Althoug I had planned to use the contents clearly sealed for each meal, they all were mixed up and I found I could not use them.
We love our Alexa Echo's. They are amazing!  They work well, they sound great and we are impressed with how easy they were to set up!
Got this for myself on cyber Monday for $50 bucks and I received it today. Wow what an amazing sound. I love it! The music sounds great.
I bought this as a Christmas present. It worked great, but it’s not even been a month since Christmas and it won’t even turn on.
It doesn’t pick up voice recognition well. It has a hard time finding Alexa enabled devices, and a lot of times it does not follow through with a command.

Just got it recently, I've been using the 1st generation echo before and I was very satisfied with it. However, Amazon allows you to return the former echo for a gift card. So, I turned the former one back (getting $25 gift card) and get this new echo for only $60. The sound quality is great. Pairing is very easy as usual. For the price, this is more than what I expect. Good looking and great sound!

I never knew it could be so fun!!! Did you know you can play music (like super annoying music) while you aren't home... but your boyfriend is. oh man good times!on a real note, the sound is awesome! I love it!!
This is a fun little speaker. Packs a great sound as well as all of the Alexa "skills". It has the ever important "mute" button.
Love this echo! Easy set up and wonderful sound that you can adjust through the Alexa app. Very pleased with this purchase.
Trying to find smart plugs that are easy for me to set up, Amazon works fine, others not so much. Front room connects great, wirks just as I want.
This is certainly fun to have in your home, I am enjoying everyday  I have only positive things to say about this product Who doesn't love Alexia!!!

I like the fact that I can shut the microphone off at anytime. I have used it to find out the temp outside, when is sunrise & sunset  & answer questions so I don’t have to go online to goggle to get answer. Used it to play music & just love it!
We are getting acquainted with what Alexa can do. We appreciate it more and more and look forward to learning additional features.

I’ve had the echo dot for quite some time but needed a stronger speaker with the Alexa functionality so I upgraded. I was very pleased with the sound as it fills a large room quite nicely! I will be purchasing more in addition to the echo show.

Arrived quickly, easy to set up, recognizes voices quickly.  Wanted it mostly to play music, but most of the songs I want aren't available and get replaced with other songs I don't want to hear.  Takes a while to learn how to ask the questions the right way to get the answers.

The sound on Echos just keeps improving. I am still delighted after a year and a half with my collection, which is finally complete now for every-room coverage. They still have trouble "dropping out" occasionally after an hour or two of play, but that's usually remedied by simply repeating instructions. Hopefully software updates will continue to improve performance in that area.
Much better sound quality than my 2nd gen echo. I want to pair it with another echo but it will have to be another 3rd gen echo.
The speaker is clear and has good bass. Connecting all devices has been simple. Easy to control lights and such while on vacation.

Everything amazon puts its name on is quality. What more can I say! I run my lights with it, runs my fire stick, and can ask any question and get an immediate response. Sound quality is excellent. Never disappointed.
We are still getting used to having Alexa in the house.  I like it.  The Echo seemed like the best choice, I still think so.
better sound then last gen, like that its smaller, picks my voice up well, love it, i have multiple echos. and def recommend

I’m very impressed with this gizmo. At the age of 70, I am not a Techie but I was able to install and set it up with no problem. It’s fun to talk to, and the sound quality is very good. Thinking of buying another for a gift.
I does so much and has a personality of its own.  I am anxious to learn quickly about all it can do and the other items it can work with.
This thing sounds amazing and set up is extremely easy.  Alex nice to ask for news, weather, music etc......not portable...WTF....

Just wish I would have gotten the google version of this...Alexa is good at what she does but If you’re trying to get one of these things as a way of asking for answers to questions that you have it is pretty much useless...
Replaced one of my Dots with this unit. Sound is worlds better. Volume is much higher than the Dot while retaining great sound quality. And i caught the price at the right time!
I love this product! I want one in every room. Incredible sound quality and love the fact that it can sync to multiple music platforms.

My husband told me to get this for myself so I can’t set timers and all other things...little did I know it’s a gift the whole family can get a use out of even just for humor...I think my son who is 14, my husband and myself spent 2 hours in silence just playing around and enjoying Alexa

I received as a gift this holiday season. We tried to use for weeks but our Labrador canine of 11 years changed her behavior immediately after purchasing this device. From reading on Amazon forums,  there is a major high pitch frequency issue that makes dogs act like they hear thunderstorms and fireworks every time you say they word Alexa. I experienced this with my dog. We had to put the Echo back in the box. Too much stress on her.
This unit plays a few songs in suggested genre, then stops.  It also sometimes shuts off for no reason.  This was a brand new purchase, does it have a warranty?
I love the red color, it is absolutely beautiful and looks amazing in my game room. Sound quality is awesome! Very pleased!
Love the stero sound with music. Don’t like the fact that it’s listening all the time. Enjoying it more then I though I would.
Great sound, gets loud, good for my house. Does not always recognize my request or plays the wrong songs. Great with weather, recipes, etc

Great- mostly used for music. They should have a lock as I have a 4 and 6 year old and they don’t stop with asking Alexa things...maybe a better voice recognition to only identify my voice- I don’t know what would work best. I currently changed the prompt name from Alexa to one of the choices - seems to work now bit my 6yo is catching on.
Very good sounding speaker.  Fills up a room.  Not gonna blow your socks off. But works great.  Have two of them.  Love em
We are enjoying this very much, it is much better then a radio for listening to music, you just say what you want to hear.
I think this is one of the best gift I have ever received its so much fun and there's so many things that you can do with it
Onev of the best purchases  I have made. I use it constantly for music,news, weather reports, etc. It is incredible
Alexa is so easy to use. I just plugged it in and joined my WIFI. I later connected smart lights and just tell “Alexa, lights on”
I don't like that owning this product comes with encouragement to buy lots more products to enhance what it can do. I like the sound quality and ability to listen to radio stations via the internet.

Super easy to pair with my router a fun to use. I don't have music channels on my TV and listening to my iTunes play list gets old. Alexa will play what I ask even if I don't know the whole name of the piece or album. I check on the weather, get headlines and just about anything I need to know. My only regret is that I should have had one long ago.

We have an original large Echo, an Echo Dot, a second generation Echo, and now this one.  The sound quality on this one is the best of them all, even better than the large original Echo.  I would recommend this to anyone.
This gen 3 has much better voice recognition vs. gen 2.  Sound quality is also much better.  Definitely a worthy upgrade!

I bought a regular Bluetooth speaker about a foot wide, but skinny, for 80 bucks and it sounded like it could just be a basic 25 dollar speaker from TJ Maxx. I decided if I was gonna pay 80 for that I’d pay another 10 for the Alexa. I returned the first speaker, got the Alexa, and never have I ever spent a better 10 bucks. SOUND QUALITY IS GREAT. VOICE RECOGNITION IS GREAT EVEN WITH MUSIC AT FULL VOLUME. Small, but LOUD AND CLEAR.

Its all good but after a month my ECHO speaker started to overheat and i had to unplug it for a bit to cool down. Also before i notice that it was overheating it wasnt responding to anything that say and i had to get real close to it so it could hear me. Im giving 4 star because it just didnt one time and after that it seems fhe problem its fixed and now i own 3 more of them
Our first Alexa thingy. Still getting used to yelling out song requests. Fun. Appreciate the good Speaker quality for the price. Pretty cool. Works great.

Got the echo for myself and the echo dots for the kids! I can’t believe I never purchased these before! Amazing feature to have in our lives. I love music, my daughter loves book! It’s an all around amazing addition to the house.
Enjoy listening to music using Echo (3rd gen) using Amazon music, great sound, clarity and connectivity. Quality built and just the right size!

The sound quality is as expected and delivers very good sound for our kitchen space. There are issues with the device sputtering out of network connection for no reason. I called customer support and they had me reset and reboot the device, and also suggested some of the channels may be better than others (?) Many times I just unplug the device and let it reconnect to our 5G network and then hope for the best
I have 3 Amazon echo's for different parts of my home & I love them, however, the sound quality is not as good as I would like.  You get what you pay for is a good thing to remember!!
Music or talk radio primarily with weather reports around the US. We have an Echo in our bathroom for the same purpose.
I installed two to make quick and easy stereo speakers for TV. They sound great and I also added a sub for awesome bass.

I took the trade-in offer and replaced my 1st Gen with the 3rd. Speaker quality is bit better and I like it just as I liked the 1st, but as other people said, I do miss the rotating ring on the 1st Gen.

What an awesome gadget, although it is like having another teenager around and you always have to tell her what to do😋.  The phone rings, Alexa! Turn it down!😁 We love Alexa. I am thinking about getting one for work.
My husband has Familian Tremors.  This makes his life much easier to get music, information, and facts quick and easy.

I bought Echo on a 5 month payment plan at regular price 2 weeks before Black Friday.  Unfortunately Amazon would not give me the sales price adjustment even though I still owed 4 months on plan. I wasn't offered any work arounds to take advantage of 40% off sale.  Too much trouble to return and re-purchase.  Disappointed but Echo is a fine product.
This thing sounds great and voice recognition is very good, especially for not costing hundreds like an Apple thingie.

My husband is only 49 and had a fall at work shortly before Thanksgiving which caused a subarachnoid brain bleed. I bought several in order to place them around the house to allow me to check on him via my phone thru the echo devices using drop in features and linked them to home devices making it easier for him to control. They have worked fabulously for these reasons as well as the popular features often seen in commercials.
Very easy to set up and to use. Amazon makes sure you know all of the possibilities for using your Echo. I now can listen to my siriusxm on the echo...

Echo was easy to set up. It comes in very handy around the house. In addition to the great music, answers to many questions are available by the sound of your voice. Those trivia questions that nag you because you cant remember. Those measurement questions in the kitchen or at your work bench. many other capabilities I haven't tried yet.
Bought this for my husband for Christmas because he like to listen to music and it promised improved sound over echo Dot. It worked less than a month and shut off I don’t have box any longer
Received this for a Christmas gift . Still getting use to it .  But so far I am enjoying it very much .  Great gift !

I received this as a gift and just love it.  It was easy to install (my grandson said so)and super simple to use.  I use it to play music (that's free if you're a Prime member), get weather reports and get info.  The best gift I've ever gotten was my first Kindle but my Echo is a close second.
The sound is somewhat better than that of the echo dot. I plan to try one from Bose to see if I can get the overall sound quality I'm looking for
This was a Chrustmas gift and so far I really like it.  I enjoy being able to set a timer from anywhere.  Very handy.

I like the voice quality which is pretty great as of this price. I mostly use Apple Music to connect with Echo. I’m not very familiar with amazon music but in the future I may choose to use it more because the interaction between Alex and amazon music may be better, which also means Echo shall be improved in the connection with other music apps. Alex can’t catch me all the time, like some misunderstanding of the word I said.

I love having Alexa around to turn my home into a smart home.  It allows me to turn on lights, listen to music, get news updates, access my calendar and so much more.  I plan to expand and get some echo dots too. The sound quality is very crisp.
I asked Alexa to destroy Bixby, Cortana,  and Siri, but she's "unsure about that". Hopefully someday she figures it out.

It makes random noises for no reason. Had to call support to get it to integrate with microwave and fire stick. The sound quality is ok. The problem is that it rarely recognizes commands . It is almost as bad as Siri

I like it only thing is when I tell it to play music from Apple Music it says i need to link it even though it says in the ap that I am linked to Apple Music. Other than that i like it! Gets loud for how small it is.
Alexa plays my favorite music and answers my questions with a pleasant, personality filled voice Her jokes can make me laugh out loud.
Sound quality isn’t as good as I was expecting. Still gets very loud and Alexa is pretty helpful. Was a solid purchase
I was given this echo as a Christmas gift from my daughter.  I love love it. I can listen to the music I want to here. I am learning how to use it for other things also.
My husband was very happy we got this. I like that it integrates easily with the Dots. Great sound quality & skills.

I ordered the twilight blue thinking it would look like the picture. Wrong. It's more like a dull pale demin color and not the pretty blue as indicated in the picture.  I would have chosen the gray if I knew the blue was going to look so bland.
Like my old echo dot better, quite frankly.  Sound quality is more deep and loud than with the dot, but not as clear and crisp.
We love Alexa.  Every day we use it to listen to JW.ORG readings and music, Spotify music and with our Ring device.
Love the sound quality and the Play Music Everywhere in combo with our first Alexa speaker we've had several years.

So far, one month in, this has been a nice addition to our living room. Between the tv, lights, and vacuum it makes being lazy that much easier. Gone are the days of finding a remote. Over are the daily tasks of sweeping up pet hair. Going to bed is so much easier as the lights simply turn off with a simple command. The Jetsons would have been proud.
I got the Echo to have music in my sewing room, and it’s working quite well.  I was a little disappointed that the “blue” really looks gray in most lights.
I bought it solely to have another Echo for a different room.  I wouldn't know the difference between the 2nd generation and the 3rd.  I'm as satisfied with it as I am my 2nd generation Echo.
I like how Alexa works with my WiFi lights,  thermostat and fire tv. I also like the routines and sound is awesome.

We love the echo devices. We had 3 dots already and added this one because we wanted better sounds quality in the larger room. Uses are pretty limited (lists, setting timers, music, weather) but that's plenty for us given the low price. Docked one start because we fairly regularly have problems with it hearing us particularly when it's playing music. It's on a window sill so maybe reverberation is why.
Was happy with the 2nd Gen, but needed to add another.  I feel the improvement in sound quality is very noticable.
Sometimes is aggravating but at the end I’m so happy with, sound quality is good for small spaces, just got my echo studio and together omg, amazing sound
Enjoy having Alexa play music and provide infirmation, often with humor; also like having the plug to turn on a light when entering a dark room.
I use it to play music and audio books at night. Also my alarm clock. Great product. Actually makes me like Alexa.
The color is great and the voice recognition is excellent.  The sound quality is clear and the speakers are better.
We have several of the Gen 2 in service.  The most pronounced feature of this unit is the robust sound.  Excellent.
I now have three echoes in my apartment. I love having speaker groups and being able to hear music everywhere at a reasonable volume. Great quality for the price!
The sound quality was improved over my original one.  The coloring makes it less visible.  Installation was easy.

It was relatively easy to setup. Once sync to my IPad, I was able to enjoy listening to my audiobooks borrowed from the library. I also appreciate that I can tell the Echo to turn off after a number of minutes, so I have music to lull me to sleep.
It took me a long time to join the ‘smart’ home movement but I’m so glad I did. Having lots of fun getting to know Alexis and all she can do.
Bought the 2nd Gen Echo RED and had to get the new one to add to my Alexa family. Sounds great. Grouped with various other Echo units for an amazing sound experience.
I love this but I have to repeat my self alot for Alexa to answer but it perfect for music best sound I have heard

I love this echo. The sound quality is great. I use sleep sounds pretty much every night and the alarm in the morning. I like the reminders, recipes, asking questions, and asking the weather. I use it every day for one thing or another. It’s not a necessary kind of thing, but it’s certainly convenient.
Easy to set up and surprising quality sound. The overall appearance is okay, a little more style would look better.
I upgraded my old echo gen 1 to this new echo 3rd gen because of the sound quality and I’m happy with my decision.

Hubby got me this for Christmas because it looked like fun.  Not entirely sure what I was expecting given nothing in my house is not "smart" I have really only used it to play music and it seems to make a great little speaker nonetheless and some things she says are pretty comical. Was nice of Amazon to offer a smart plug for 99 cents so I can hopefully start to see what else this little baby can do.
I love the convenience of Alexa! But I’ve only used it to listen to music.  My WiFi is pitiful so can’t always enjoy.

I love my Alexa . The only issue I cannot get ant bulb to work with it  to turn on and off my light. I spoke to amazon and they told me what to do, but still I had to return the bulb back, the connection did not work as people said in the reviews.  Its say I need a hub or such.  So am not happy about that. To explore other things Alexa can do. And that it has be plugged always . That needs to change I mean alexa... lol
Just bought the echo 3rd gen and its a big improvement over the echo dot 2nd gen that I had. Better overall sound and looks. Buy it!

Me parece excelente todo los servicios y funcione que tiene echo el color me parece óptimo ya que se diferencia bien entre los otros dispositivos sin caer en el clásico color negro en mi caso que básicamente es el que más veo por lo general
It did not integrate as we hoped...sounds good with music but not good as a TV sound device.
This little speaker has the best sound of my 3 Amazon Echos. It has deeper bass. I can play music throughout my home.
Great sound and soooo easy to set up.  Did not give 5 stars only because it has no battery--- has to be plugged in to function.

This was a gift for my husband who is visually impaired.  He particularly wanted to be able to ask for favorite radio stations.  He is very pleased with his ability to do that, and with the quality of the sound.
Purchased for my wife at Christmas and she's now talking about adding additional capabilities in our house.  Easy to set up.
The 3rd gen has a much better microphone for voice recognition. The sound quality has also been greatly improved

I was debating getting another Alexa. I outfitted my home with Google home. While google worked it was slow and sometimes unresponsive. Alexa was always on point with great sound. When the product (red) line was released I hade no doubt I was replacing google home with the new echo red. I love it so much better. I only wish the echo dot was also in product (Red).
Not as easy to work with as you may think.  Frustrating at some points when an obvious request is misinterpreted.

Used this Echo along with the Echo Dots and Echo Plus to setup a sound sys. in my house, played Christmas music in all room "at the same time", LOVE IT. Sure beats installing speakers and costly sound systems. Great sound. Also purchased the "Ring" door bell. Love it, don't know why I waited so long.

This 3rd gen is an improvement over my 1st gen Echo in terms of sound quality, but is still behind a bit compared to my HomePods in my gym. The microphones in this gen seems to respond a lot better over previous especially when you ask for a command while audio is currently playing. Overall improvement in my opinion.

Expected a little more sound quality. Echo does not hear my commands often... and keeps responding to a wrong command at times... eh...  I know it's a work in progress... but it does well for  what it is. I'm satisfied.

Very good bass, mid and treble are clear and are comfortable to listen. You need to download an app. But it is easy to set up. I bought it on Black Friday at a discounted price. Very good value for the money. Highly recommended.

I ask myself how did I wait so long to own one.  Everyone has enjoyed it. We love the trivia games the whole family can play. The music, I stream my favorite stations. Definitely  give this a 5 rating.
The sound on this one is a LOT better than the old one.  Traded a first gen in for this one and am glad I did!!
Best thing I’ve discovered. I have two of these and an Echo dot. Exceeds my expectations for this price point.
I bought this because the speaker for my Echo dot stopped working. The sound is phenomenal. I am very pleased.
It doesn’t work very well at  all the songs skip it will not play a song all the way through without skipping.
This thing sounds awesome..she tells me weather..store hours..has great sound quality and she confirms whos right or wrong in my household debates lol

I received Alexa as a gift and have enjoyed it since. I am very satisfied with Alexa and have so much fun with her everyday. Playing songs and enjoying broadcast is a cinch.  So glad Amazon sells her and gives people so much to look forwward to everyday.  Thank you Amazon and those that I received the gift from.  Looking forward to new products in the future and using Amazon.  Thumbs up to you!!!

I own 3 echo dots positioned across my home. This is my first full Echo and right off the bat, the sound is already of better quality and higher pitch. I love and recommend this product to anyone looking for good quality sound.
I really love these amazon products. Very simple to operate. Great sound quality. The entire family enjoys them daily.
Works great. Fills room with sound. Can hear me when I speak softly from across the room while other noises are prevalent.
Love this for listening to music, setting reminders, looking for my cell phone, or as a personal encyclopedia!
Love being able to ask for music, especially at Christmas.  Neat to be able to ask for answers to questions I have!
It’s better than the original one I had, the first generation. However, I don’t think that it’s come so far that it’s worth a 5 star rating
the sound is okay.  not the best.  i wouldn’t say it’s as good as my karmon speakers or anything.  obviously better than the echo dot.  I don’t regret getting it so far
This Alexa has very good sound quality, and the pairing was very simple. I would recommend buying one or two.

Like many buyers, I miss the rotating volume ring. But, the problems it seemed to cause with audio failures are not missed. Also, the fabric exterior and color choices are very pleasant to the eye. All in all, a great buy and performer.
Use this for work and I have it playing in a 5,000.00sq foot building and it’s nice you can still talk to people and hear the music when working.

If you are using multiple echos , dots in your home they are not reliable.  The sound is great when they work but units stop playing constantly.  Theses issues are reported all over help forums with no solution that solves it.
Having Aleza is a plus in my life. It reminds me of my doctors appoinment, shopping list. weather and other features. I love it.
Don't have rechargeable battery. And the firs alexa generation had. So bad
I really like the sound from this Echo.  Speaker is clear.  Its size is great. I have it placed in my kitchen on the bar.  I can interact with it from Kitchen, or living room.

Just received this device a few days ago, so I am still learning to get the most out of it. But what I can say already now is: Amazing technology and super sound! Looking forward to the continued ride...
Works really well - voice recog is great and it does learn your voice. The Plug at $5 was a great deal too.

I purchased this product and absolutely love it! It has a great voice recognition and sound quality. I love being able to listen to music from either my phone or amazon music. I will certainly buy this item for a family member in the future!
We had a Christmas Brunch with about 20 people.  Everyone enjoyed being able to select their own favorite artist.  At least 3 people were rushing back home to order one.  Most happy with Alexa
I was always hesitant to purchase this item but it is worth it. I have one in almost every room and I have gotten so spoiled.  I love being able to drop into my children’s rooms to speak with them.
I only have bought the dots before but when I upgraded to the larger echo 3rd generation I was very happy. great sound and just everything is great. No complaints..

Already highly satisfied with the Echo line of products I was curious to see if in fact it would be improved. Yes, is the answer!. The sound is improved and the voice recognition is more seamless. Previous device would have issues hearing me with echo in the room. This model has had no issues. Awesome device.

I am a bit of an audiophile, so I am being very specific about likes/dislikes. I wish I could sharpen the sound quality...I find myself longing for a crisper treble and presence. Otherwise this was a great investment. Kids and wife use it constantly and I am blown away by the voice recognition.
Replaced gen 1 Echo. Greatly improved sound quality with better voice recognition when playing music loud.

I'm very technology challenged but it was easy to set up and use.  This was a gift and I didn't think I would really use it but I am pleasantly surprised by Alexa.  It turns out she is like having company.
This is my 2nd Alexa and I put it in my large media room and the sound is great. Also love this new color.
I was going to get a dot but a friend said to get this model for listening to music.  Glad I did music sounds great.
Sound quality is awesome.  Alexa is a little scary, but it’s also cool to be able to ask it any questions.  I bought one for my entire family.

Great product. So happy I got it. I think even picks up my voice better than the fire box. The only thing it the sound sync with other Alexa devices doesn't work that great. You still can hear a delay even with going into the Alexa app and trying to adjust the timing between devices from there. Other than this I'm happy with this purchase.
The style looks very good.  It is easy to set up and integrate.  The sound I’d fantastic and it’s use is enormous.  Excellent item to have.  Highly recommend.
There is too much bass. The music sound OK but when Alexis responds the answers sound muffled and unclear
Didn't realize that the echo 3rd generation did not control plugs or the TV need an echo plus. Good sound system.... have 2 echoes &an echo plus.
Got this as a gift to replace a travel unit I was using. This unit is far superior with much better sound.

I bought it specifically to listen to Sirius Xm on it, and for the portability. It won't play Sirius continuously, or for long periods of time. Nor will it accept a direct request to play Sirius . I have to turn it on with my phone.
It’s great to have it work with Apple Music and the software has greatly improved. I find I listen to a lot more music because the quality is so good.

Works great with Apple Music. Sound Quality is great at mid range, but if you turn the volume higher it almost sounds as if the speakers a ripping. Its great for apartments but if you wanna add it to a big house its not worth it. Great design.
It does the things that I use it for like weather updates, my traffic commute to work etc. I love it! Good sound coming out of it too.
Best gadget ever.  Gets used everyday and stays centrally in the kitchen.  Couldn't ask for a better device
I love these amazon products. I have one in every room. My entire family loves the convenience of Alexa.

Needs improvement with functionality with Hulu. As well as streaming Apple Music. Sound quality is great wish they had a feature to be able to control with a set of speakers each individual speakers sound settings. Separately not as one collective unit.

Not good at really anything. Always says alexa is learning and she does not understand. If you just want time date n music shes good but most everything else she dont understand or u have to be really specific n exact. People dont talk like that usually
I just love this Echo the sound quality is so rich and the bass is so deep it's a great speaker. Alexa works well. Am learning more about the functionality of Alexa program.
Great sounding speaker for my work I’m a tech for a auto dealership and it has plenty of power to here well
Small but powerful. Nice Mid’s & Highs. Base is very impressive. All in all, great value  for the sound b/f even talking about the Echo technology.
I already had one, and LOVE it!!! Gave this one as a gift, and they LOVE it!!!! Every house needs one!!
Like using voice commands music sounds great.  Have not set up lights or TV yet will be fun once set up
This is my first experience with voice recognition equipment. I have found it both enjoyable and useful.

This is our 8th Alexa device. It has a much richer sound and base than the other devices we own. This 3rd generation device easily fills the room with sound and is more discrimination. Definitely a great improvement. We are consider replacing all of our "hockey puck" devices int he bedrooms with this one!
Got the speaker for Black Friday for a good price. I use it to listen to prime music, tune in, and Sirius xm and it does a good job with those services. Would definitely buy another one

Best ever! I can connect my phone and my laptop to listen music. I don’t have to use my headphone unless if I need to; it is the best! My mom got me for my early Christmas present! I always want get speaker so I don’t put my headphone in my phone because it hurt my ears sometimes. But speaker is so CHAMP ever! I swear. I can listen music while I work on my book or clean the house. But I’m deaf tho 🤷🏾‍♀️
I know have 4 and I play music everywhere. It is as if I have surround sound in my home. The sound is rich.
Bought for 98 year old mom. She is delighted with sound and voice recognition. Best improvement to echo.
I never would have thought I would want an Echo, but I got one for Christmas and it’s so neat! I talk to Alexa all the time and the sound quality is amazing. It sounds better than my soundbar.
This is better than the Google thing I had and returned.  This has a lot of stuff it does and I need to explore it more.
Great sounding speaker with seamless integration with Amazon services. I’m amazed at what Alexa can do.
The main problem with this speaker is the sound. :-) Too much bass. No mids. Tinny highs. The result is at lower volumes it sounds terrible. Gets better as it gets louder.

Gifted this to my brother for Christmas and he spent the rest of the fat listening to music and playing with it. Bought smart plug with it and he loved it! Sound is loud and crisp and bass is awesome.
The sound quality and volume is not the best. The previous version I had (2nd Gen) was better and much louder!
Dot arrived first. Works well. Can’t get Echo to work. Called amazon and little or no help.  Need help.
One improvement I would recommend is that  the wake up name could be customized. I have 6 of these and I have to double up on names which is causing confusion.
I am joy listening to music on it also I enjoy it for making lists for the supermarket and to-do list
While I am not big on IoT, there is something to be said for fun. We have renters and they love this!
I was resistant to get a device that listens to me.  Not anymore.  Alexa takes notes, puts things on grocery lists and so much more.  I'm having a great time getting to know Alexa.
I wanted a good speaker and music in the garage. It works well and loud and that was what I was looking for.
There are NO dislikes! We plugged The Dot into “my room” and It was like talking to our main Alexa. So simple- best ever- very HAPPY!!
second one. shorts out, cuts out, sometimes does not work at all. great sound when working. going to try dot.
EXCELLENT SPEAKERS !! SOUND IS AMAZING !  STEREO PAIR IS GREAT ! MUCH BETTER SOUND THAN THE ECHO DOT.
This is my first purchase towards adding Voice recognition and smart features to my home.  Impressive sound.
This is my second Echo.  My first died on me after 6 years.  Ilike the color and the way it looks. Still has the same capabilities as before
Great design fits into my traditional livingroom. Awesome bass and sound quality. Battery pack allows placement anywhere. Ease of setup.
Just plug it in.  Download Alexa from the App Store on you phone and start using your echo.  Sooo easy.
I’m bought in with Alexa. I’m just ordering anything Alexa now. If it has a Alexa logo, I’m buying it!

Alexa makes a perfect roommate...she is perfectly behaved, only speaks when spoken to, generally knowledgeable about a variety of subjects and does not leave dirty clothes on the bedroom floor.  Her ability to play any music I request is extraordinary from Mose Allison to Bob Dylan to Andrea Bocelli.
Love love love this new blue color!!! The big echo has a much better sound quality as well as responsive time compared to the echo dot.
Overall nice product. Price was reasonable for the Echo, sub was a bit more pricey but worth the added bass.
Love it... I listen to 80’s music when cleaning, ask questions and the grandkids love playing with it
If you have been back and fourth about buying this.... DO IT! I never write reviews but as I sit here listening to music, the quality is amazing! What an awesome purchase!!!!
Amazing what technology brings us today.  Very handy. Easy to set up and smart plugs make them even more useful.
Alex I can do anything pretty much we just love it ask questions, make shopping list, Etc.....

Good product fir the service provided. Got this for my wife and she lives it.  My wife would say the most notable feature is the ability to organize your schedules and to do lists through voice with Alexa.

I like how the design is simple and how Alexa has been working in tandem with my computer space. Only downside is sometimes she likes to talk over me when I tell her to stop xD like VERY LOUD over me. I dunno if it’s a feature but she’ll randomly increase volume, maybe my roommates have been telling her to be louder without my knowledge. Anyways it’s a great buy.
This was my first of its type. Works very nicely, don't have to shout for it to respond- a little too much base playing music but ok.
Echo is a great product. Alexa has many capabilities. We’re learning new ones every day. Would highly recommend this product
This is my first Echo and I love it. I have friends who have them but older generations. I find the speaker on this to be really clear and full. Alexa, please don’t tell Siri I’m cheating.
Now I need to replace my old Echo's with this new one. I thought the old ones were great, but it exceeds my expectations!
I purchased for my daughter. She loves it!
I had answered all questions @ played great music! Easy to install!  Takes up very little space!
It's just amazing how much stuff you can do with Alexa. I would highly recommend Alexa to anyone.
This is my first foray into Alexa, super happy! I wanted a home speaker so I don’t have the tv on all the time. I only wish I had three more to truly rock out!
Alexa plays music well when asked to. Was very easy to set up.

There is a know issue with the Alexa app equalizer settings resetting themselves to default after being set to the customers preferences. This issue is approx a month in the working of being corrected but has not been resolved. My question is why? It's code! Rewrite it!!

Love this little speaker. The setup is a breeze. My only issue is not with the speaker itself but with the app. The music control section of the Alexa app is a bit clunky, specially if you are using a third party music library, like Apple Music

installation was very simple compared to the experience with the original echo dot a year ago. i use it for a speaker in my home office and the sound is great for casual listening. i have no rating for tech support because i haven't needed any.
Sometimes it doesn't recognize my voice. It could be that it is next to my TV. When I turn the TV volume off, it does pick up my voice.

I received the Echo as a gift for Christmas, and am still learning all about it.  I love using the work-out options, and we played some trivia right away when we got it set up. I have used it for timers, and asking how far it is between certain cities for travel purposes. So much to learn, and it is helpful to get the emails to help with this.
I bought one for each of my kids for Christmas. They all love it. They listen to their music, use it as an alarm. Great quality.
After connecting to Amazon Music or Pandora etc. often times only one song will play and the Echo will disconnect and you have to restart.

I like the varies options it has as far as playing different music. Still trying to understand Alexa’s full capabilities because I know it could do more than what I’m using it for right now. Stay tuned!
I upgraded from my Dot and live the quality of the sound. It really makes my music sound great.

I really like having this, we are still finding ways to integrate it into our lives.  Right now we have one smart plug and enjoy having it turn and off the television.  We have our grocery list on it, find out the weather, and are learning more and more ways to use it.
My grandson loves this and listens to it all the time ... he even has music play while he sleeps
So great to have music, weather, driving conditions, school closings and random information in an instant!
Much improved upgrade from the privious model. Deeper bass. Clearer highs. The size also makes them much more discreet in the home.
Never thought I would enjoy Alexa but the Echo is great! Works well & very convenient for more than just music. Grocery lists, timers etc. Love it!
I’m not noticing much improvement from the original one I’ve had. I hope to notice differences soon.
Bought for the living room area. Attractive and effective. Voice recognition is on point. And the speaker is pretty impressive.
I love the sound of the speaker. I have 3 Alexas. They work great as speakers working together
The depth of sound is very good. I have noticed some slight distortion with some of the highs.
The sound fills up our living room. We love it and so do our kids, “Alexa, play Frozen 2 music...”

It was easy to set up and for the most part it is very responsive.  The sound is a great improvement over the echo dot.  Listening to music is so easy with it and the sound is really good from something so small.
I returned the Studio and kept this! Can't beat the price and the sound, also very convenient!
One if things I use it for is playing music of my choice in my room to exercise to or just to listen to music.
I don't like that it requires location information to be installed but besides that it is nice.

We finally got on the Alexa train and love it! The only reason I have not given it five stars is because it ‘statics’ and cuts out which is extremely annoying. Sometimes once it does that she has shut down and does not respond for a while. Otherwise the sound is great! So far all we’ve used her for is music, jokes, grocery list, timers and alarms.

Sound is better quality than my Bose wave. Had the Echo first generation. This is no comparison. It’s like your grandmother keeping the old 21” tube television rather than upgrading to a 50” flat screen. Very satisfied.
The sound is great , much better than the other version, I was really surprised at the sound for the price
Great product. Love its functionality. Guard Home option is great, even if you have an alarm at home, and cameras. I do recommend this product for others to buy.
Absolutely love this device. The sound is amazing and it can literally make your life easier
got 2 so I could link with the Sub and make a stereo pair..  for my basement sound system...
For entertainment. Disappointed with music it has to com through Amazon and they don't have access to many of my selection
This seems maybe a little better as far as sound then Alexa 2. but just not that much better

Alexa cannot find any of Beethoven's five piano concertos. I subscribed to Music Unlimited but Alexa does not tell me when the music I ask for comes from Amazon Music or Music Unlimited so I cannot determine if what I am paying for is worth the price.
I have set 2 of these up as a stereo pair + sub mostly for streaming Spotify. All good but I wish I could also stream YouTube Music ..
Very good product...I uses echo dot before made this echo even more outstanding....my opinion thz
I love how convenient it is. Kinda creepy when she randomly starts talking abiut random things though without triggering her name. She can whisper which makes her sound more human its really funny.

My girlfriend has one. We play it and dance to it every time I am there. I bought one for my parents for Christmas and they love it. Good sound quality and can play quite loud. I can't imagine needing the larger model unless you were planning to be playing it in a very big area with a lot of people there.
Voice recognition is unreal... Sound quality is great... still learning everything that smart speaker and Alexa is capable of.
Excellent sound quality for music. It’s very close to my Bose system that cost a lot more.

Product worked fantastic but I noticed after a while things weren't working the way the usually do. The alexa feature now takes multiple attempts to play the simplest of songs and will sometimes act like it never heard me. Then I noticed that I've been needing to constantly up the volume cause it doesnt hit with the same punch anymore. Overall it was good, while it lasted.
Ordered for my Aunt.....she is thrilled with this! I have 2 in my home and love them!
music sound much better than the echo dots. Easy to set up. Was a great Christmas Present.
The voice recognition was not as good as the Dot but the sound quality outways that fault.
It's great and easy to connect. The only part I dont like, it the light that is on all the time.
My son bought us this for christmas and we love it !!  The sound is great and alexa listens well !!
Great speaker.  Have this one setup in my bedroom.  Easy to use,  nice to be able to ask Alexa to turn on music and control volume from a distance.  Sound quality is great.
I love my Echo Plus Smart Speaker.  First thing in the morning I ask for the weather, wind speed, etc and then I ask it to play music, a speciific song or artist, and more.

What even more kooleer is if you have more than one Alexa echo speaker you can pair them all , create a group for an entire home entertainment audio system. One in the living room, one in the bedroom, one in office room etc. Then apps like Spotify will be able to see the group as and audio output , allow music all over the home. Try it.
Brought  this as a Christmas gift for my sister and she loves it and can't stop talking about it.
I now have a six speaker setup and it’s like going to a rock concert every time I put music on.

Had a 1st Gen Dot and upgraded to this 3rd Gen Echo. It hasn’t been much of an upgrade at all. The new echo often returns errors when asked to do simple commands which we never ran into with the dot. Sound quality is much better but overall functionality is bad.
Im old school and finally broke down and bought this.  It has made my life so much easier.
Now she is in another part of the house---busy woman!  Great to have music of our choice.
I use it for music.  It was a gift.  I don't know all the ins and outs of doing much with it.  I guess that is the integration part.
Changed from echo dot and the transition was quick and easy. The sound quality is incredible. Already we love it.

I bought the third gen to replace my second gen. The sound is much better, a little shorter and rounder at the top. I bought two additional as gifts. I think the third gen hears me from a greater distance. Since I was replacing the second gen all I had to do was plug it in and it set itself up.  Happy with my purchase!

Participated in the trade in offer and sent in a perfect working condition echo.  I later get an email saying it is rejected and I will be charged the $25 offered with no real explanation and no help from customer service.  Please be aware if you participate in this chances are they will reject yours and charge you more.  Just hoping i get back mine and it still works.
love having this integrated with my system Music is clear and works great with smart TV.
Love this Gen3 Alexa, it was an upgrade for me from Gen1.  Can find zero faults - love it
Great!! This was an upgrade for us as we had the previous model. And we think the sound quality is so much better!!
it is quite a convenience we didn’t think we needed. But we love those conveniences and especially the speaker because we listen to music all the time.
The Gen 3 is a little larger in diameter than the previous Echos allowing for a little extra Bass response.

I love this Echo version, 3rd generation. Has a deeper sound quality, is louder without distortion and the microphone understand me more clearly from across the room. Thank you Amazon for improving my favorite smart speaker!
We love our Echo and have been using it a lot.  Love the sound of the music and the choices we get.  The whole experience is great.
I love it the sound is excellent only problem I have is it's not portable you have to keep it plugged in for it to play
Connected to Echo Sub makes the best HT ever. It sounds like I’m in a movie theater... love it!
Great sound quality. Never knew how much I was missing bass from my dots until I plugged this bad boy in, especially with Ultra HD.
Not super sound sensitive. Was cumbersome to link to LG UHD Tv. Not as unique as used to be. Needs to universally link to all wireless accessories. Not just proprietary ones.

This Echo was a gift from my daughter and her boyfriend and I wasn't really sure I would use it.  The Echo has come in very handy for so many things for sports scores, weather, recipe and just playing music.  We have the Echo in the kitchen which is very convenient and it really doesn't take up too much counter space.  It was also very easy to setup.
Has been very helpful in many way. It tells me the weather and the forecast. I can set a timer. I use it for reminders.  The music is great and easy to use.
I just love my Alexa, a great tool to own Easy to install, a lot of entertainment Great price for a great and awesome tool 5star !
I like it but don’t use it much. But when the grandkids come over they have fun with it
This is my second echo in this new version I feel the quality of the sound it's better.
It took my wife a little trial and error to get everything synced with Alexa but it is working flawlessly now. I plan to buy more of these devices.
Love it! Use it mostly for news a music. Great sound and can gesr me from the other side of the house.
Only beginning to enjoy Alexa—mostly for music availability. It was a gift and is nice.
Great sound quality, fun to use, learning the proper Alexa term take a little attention
The sound of this unit is so much better. Lots of base. I hardly use my radio any more.
Decent sound quality and volume for size. Definitely better sound than the echo gen 3 for larger rooms
all i had to do was download app.sync to my echo and bam all done already have Amazon music sounds Great!

I'm really enjoying my Echo. I received one as a gift and began using it to listen to music. The sound is definitely adequate. I liked it so much I bought another so I could create a stereo pair.  Setting them up was quick and easy. If you fancy yourself an elite audiophile, this speaker may not meet your standards; but I love music and for the price, they are the perfect little pair.
Used for shopping, music, daily news  ect. Dislike not understanding my voice sometime.
Use for creating list for shopping and things to do.  Music access is quite often used.  I have the original that is still working very well. Purchased this to use in another location.

I love that I can link this to others and listen to the music playing in whatever room I go into.  I have also amused myself greatly by programming responses to questions like "who's the best dad ever?"

You can literally whisper and it will here you! You can be on the other side of the house and she still hears you!!!

it gives me the weather any time of the day and plays my favorite music upon request. Still learning all that can be done with this.

This Echo replaces a first-generation Echo Dot we be had for a year. The sound coming out of this speaker is amazing and enables me to not have to pair my JBL Bluetooth speaker for great audio. Alexa can hear me from anywhere in the room and get it right the first time. Great device.

Always thought about getting this but now that I have been adding smart home devices I love have a single app that can run all devices.  My echo turns lights on and off, change colors, etc even though they are from different vendors.  I love being able to turn the microphone off too.
